atk-s0508a1:645_0: Tassa ekadivasaṃ kenacideva karaṇīyena gāmantaṃ gatassa kharo ābādho uppajji.
atk-s0508a1:645_3: kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti tattha gantvā taṃ gilānaṃ disvā tassa taṃ taṃ kattabbayuttakaṃ karonto divasabhāgaṃ
atk-s0508a1:645_5: na mayā pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya gāme vasitapubbaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:645_11: taṃ sutvā thero taṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā araññameva netvā ovādaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:645_12: So therassa ovāde ṭhatvā vipassitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:650_0: “Ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:653_0: So arahattaṃ patvā upajjhāyena attanā ca vuttamatthaṃ saṃsanditvā attano vivekābhiratikataṃ katakiccatañca
atk-s0508a1:654_1: Tattha upajjhāyoti vajjāvajjaṃ upanijjhāyati hitesitaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā ñāṇacakkhunā pekkhatīti upajjhāyo.
atk-s0508a1:654_7: Evaṃ pana upajjhāyena vutto sivako bhadro assājānīyo viya kasābhihato sañjātasaṃvego hutvā araññameva gantukāmataṃ pavedento –
atk-s0508a1:655_0: “Gāme me vasati kāyo, araññaṃ me gataṃ mano;
atk-s0508a1:657_1: yasmā idāni yadipi me idaṃ sarīraṃ gāmante ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:657_3: tasmā semānakopi gacchāmi gelaññena ṭhānanisajjāgamanesu asamatthatāya sayānopi iminā sayitākārena sarīsapo viya sarīsapanto, etha, bhante,
atk-s0508a1:657_6: yasmā dhammasabhāvā kāmesu saṃsāre ca ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:657_7: nekkhamme nibbāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ yāthāvato jānantassa na katthaci saṅgo,
atk-s0508a1:660_0: Pañca chinde pañca jaheti āyasmato kuṇḍadhānattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:660_2: So kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe uppanno vayappatto heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
atk-s0508a1:660_3: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ suṇanto satthārā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a1:660_4: ṭhapiyamānaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā tadanurūpaṃ puññaṃ karonto vicari.
atk-s0508a1:660_5: So ekadivasaṃ padumuttarassa bhagavato nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya nisinnassa manosilācuṇṇapiñjaraṃ mahantaṃ kadaliphalakaṇṇikaṃ upanesi,
atk-s0508a1:660_7: So tena puññakammena ekādasakkhattuṃ devesu devarajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0508a1:660_9: Evaṃ so punappunaṃ puññāni katvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapabuddhakāle bhummadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:660_10: Dīghāyukabuddhānañca nāma na anvaddhamāsiko uposatho hoti.
atk-s0508a1:660_11: Tathā hi vipassissa bhagavato chabbassantare chabbassantare uposatho ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:660_12: Kassapadasabalo pana chaṭṭhe chaṭṭhe māse pātimokkhaṃ osāresi.
atk-s0508a1:660_13: Tassa pātimokkhassa osāraṇakāle disāvāsikā dve sahāyakā bhikkhū “uposathaṃ karissāmā”ti gacchanti.
atk-s0508a1:661_5: sā tesaṃ okāsaṃ olokayamānā tesaṃ avidūreneva gacchati.
atk-s0508a1:661_6: Atheko thero ekassa hatthe pattacīvaraṃ datvā sarīravaḷañjanatthaṃ udakaphāsukaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā dhotahatthapādo
atk-s0508a1:661_7: hutvā gumbasamīpato nikkhamati bhummadevatā tassa therassa pacchato uttamarūpā itthī hutvā kese vidhunitvā
atk-s0508a1:661_8: saṃvidhāya sambandhantī viya piṭṭhiyaṃ paṃsuṃ puñchamānā viya sāṭakaṃ saṃvidhāya nivāsayamānā viya ca
atk-s0508a1:661_9: hutvā therassa padānupadikā hutvā gumbato nikkhantā.
atk-s0508a1:661_10: Ekamante ṭhito sahāyakatthero taṃ kāraṇaṃ disvāva domanassajāto “naṭṭho dāni me iminā bhikkhunā saddhiṃ dīgharattānugato sineho,
atk-s0508a1:661_12: ettakaṃ addhānaṃ iminā saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ na kareyya”nti cintetvā āgacchantassevassa,
atk-s0508a1:661_15: tādisena pāpena saddhiṃ ekamaggaṃ nāgacchāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0508a1:661_16: Taṃ kathaṃ sutvā tassa lajjibhikkhuno hadayaṃ tikhiṇasattiṃ gahetvā viddhaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:661_19: ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ dukkaṭamattampi āpattiṃ na jānāmi.
atk-s0508a1:661_23: kiṃ tvaṃ evaṃvidhena alaṅkatapaṭiyattena mātugāmena saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne hutvā nikkhanto”ti.
atk-s0508a1:661_26: Tassa yāvatatiyaṃ kathentassāpi itaro thero kathaṃ asaddahitvā attanā diṭṭhakāraṇaṃyeva bhūtattaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a1:661_27: gaṇhanto tena saddhiṃ ekamaggena agantvā aññena maggena satthu santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0508a1:661_28: Itaropi bhikkhu aññena maggena satthu santikaṃyeva gato.
atk-s0508a1:662_0: Tato bhikkhusaṅghassa uposathāgāraṃ pavisanavelāya so bhikkhu taṃ bhikkhuṃ uposathagge sañjānitvā,
atk-s0508a1:662_2: nāhaṃ tena saddhiṃ uposathaṃ karissāmī”ti nikkhamitvā bahi aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:662_3: Atha bhummadevatā “bhāriyaṃ mayā kammaṃ kata”nti mahallakaupāsakavaṇṇena tassa santikaṃ gantvā “kasmā, bhante,
atk-s0508a1:662_6: ‘nāhaṃ tena saddhiṃ uposathaṃ karomī’ti bahi ṭhitomhī”ti. “Bhante,
atk-s0508a1:662_10: mayā tumhākaṃ vīmaṃsanatthāya ‘daḷhā nu kho imesaṃ therānaṃ metti,
atk-s0508a1:662_11: no daḷhā’ti bhijjanābhijjanabhāvaṃ olokentena taṃ kammaṃ kata”nti. “Ko pana,
atk-s0508a1:662_14: bhante”ti devaputto kathento dibbānubhāvena ṭhatvā therassa pādesu nipatitvā “mayhaṃ, bhante, khamatha,
atk-s0508a1:662_16: uposathaṃ karothā”ti theraṃ yācitvā uposathaggaṃ pavesesi.
atk-s0508a1:662_17: So thero uposathaṃ tāva ekaṭṭhāne akāsi,
atk-s0508a1:662_18: mittasanthavavasena pana puna tena saddhiṃ na ekaṭṭhāne ahosīti.
atk-s0508a1:662_20: cuditakatthero pana aparāparaṃ vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:663_0: Bhummadevatā tassa kammassa nissandena ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ apāyabhayato na muccittha.
atk-s0508a1:663_1: Sace pana kismiñci kāle manussattaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0508a1:663_2: aññena yena kenaci kato doso tasseva upari patati.
atk-s0508a1:663_3: So amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:663_5: So vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā mahallakakāle satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji,
atk-s0508a1:663_6: tassa upasampannadivasato paṭṭhāya ekā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā itthī tasmiṃ gāmaṃ pavisante saddhiṃyeva gāmaṃ pavisati,
atk-s0508a1:663_11: Tassa puna purimakammanissandena sā aññesaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0508a1:663_14: eko imissā amhākaṃ sahāyikāyā”ti parihāsaṃ karonti.
atk-s0508a1:663_16: Vihāragatampi naṃ sāmaṇerā ceva daharā bhikkhū ca parivāretvā “dhāno koṇḍo jāto”ti parihāsaṃ karonti.
atk-s0508a1:663_17: Athassa teneva kāraṇena kuṇḍadhānattheroti nāmaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:663_18: So uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya tehi kariyamānaṃ keḷiṃ sahituṃ asakkonto ummādaṃ gahetvā “tumhe koṇḍā,
atk-s0508a1:663_23: Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, dhāna,
atk-s0508a1:663_24: sāmaṇerehi saddhiṃ pharusavācaṃ vadasī”ti vatvā tena “saccaṃ bhagavā”ti vutte “kasmā evaṃ vadesī”ti āha. “Bhante,
atk-s0508a1:663_26: “Tvaṃ pubbe katakammaṃ yāvajjadivasā jīrāpetuṃ na sakkosi,
atk-s0508a1:663_27: puna evarūpaṃ pharusaṃ māvadī bhikkhū”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0508a1:665_0: Dukkhā hi sārambhakathā, paṭidaṇḍā phuseyyu taṃ.
atk-s0508a1:667_0: Esa pattosi nibbānaṃ, sārambho te na vijjatī”ti. ;
atk-s0508a1:668_0: Imañca pana tassa therassa mātugāmena saddhiṃ vicaraṇabhāvaṃ kosalaraññopi kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:668_2: vīmaṃsathā”ti pesetvā sayampi mandeneva parivārena therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ekamante olokento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:668_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe thero sūcikammaṃ karonto nisinno hoti,
atk-s0508a1:668_4: sāpi itthī avidūre ṭhāne ṭhitā viya paññāyati.
atk-s0508a1:668_5: Rājā disvā “atthidaṃ kāraṇa”nti tassā ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a1:668_6: Sā tasmiṃ āgacchante therassa vasanapaṇṇasālaṃ paviṭṭhā viya ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:668_7: Rājāpi tāya saddhiṃ tameva paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā sabbattha olokento adisvā “nāyaṃ mātugāmo,
atk-s0508a1:668_8: therassa eko kammavipāko”ti saññaṃ katvā paṭhamaṃ therassa samīpena gacchantopi theraṃ avanditvā tassa
atk-s0508a1:668_9: kāraṇassa abhūtabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgamma theraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno “kacci, bhante,
atk-s0508a1:668_15: evarūpena parikkilesena saddhiṃ carantānaṃ tumhākaṃ ke nāma pasīdissanti,
atk-s0508a1:668_16: ito paṭṭhāya vo katthaci gamanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0508a1:668_18: tumhe yoniso manasikāre mā pamajjitthā”ti nibaddhabhikkhaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a1:668_19: Thero rājānaṃ upatthambhakaṃ labhitvā bhojanasappāyena ekaggacitto hutvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:669_0: Tadā mahāsubhaddā ugganagare micchādiṭṭhikakule vasamānā “satthā maṃ anukampatū”ti uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a1:669_1: nirāmagandhā hutvā uparipāsādatale ṭhitā “imāni pupphāni antare aṭṭhatvā dasabalassa matthake vitānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:669_3: dasabalo imāya saññāya sve pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhatū”ti saccakiriyaṃ katvā aṭṭha sumanapupphamuṭṭhiyo vissajjesi.
atk-s0508a1:669_4: Pupphāni gantvā dhammadesanāvelāya satthu matthake vitānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:669_5: Satthā taṃ sumanapupphavitānaṃ disvā citteneva subhaddāya bhikkhaṃ adhivāsetvā punadivase aruṇe uṭṭhite ānandattheraṃ āha – “ānanda,
atk-s0508a1:669_14: Ānando “satthā tādisānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ salākaṃ na dāpeti,
atk-s0508a1:669_15: ariyānaṃyeva dāpetī”ti vitakkaṃ uppādetvā gantvā satthu ārocesi.
atk-s0508a1:669_20: bhavissati ettha kāraṇa”nti “kuṇḍadhānassa salākaṃ dassāmī”ti gamanaṃ abhinīhari.
atk-s0508a1:669_21: Kuṇḍadhāno tassa pure āgamanā eva abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā iddhiyā ākāse ṭhatvā “āharāvuso, ānanda,
atk-s0508a1:669_23: mādisaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantaṃ na satthā nivāretī”ti hatthaṃ pasāretvā salākaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a1:669_24: Satthā taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ imasmiṃ sāsane paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a1:669_25: Yasmā ayaṃ thero rājānaṃ upatthambhakaṃ labhitvā sappāyāhāralābhena samāhitacitto vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto upanissayasampannatāya chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:678_0: “Ye ca santi samitāro, yakkhā imamhi pabbate;
atk-s0508a1:685_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:701_0: Evaṃbhūtassapi imassa therassa guṇe ajānantā ye puthujjanā bhikkhū tadā paṭhamaṃ salākaggahaṇe “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti samacintesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:701_1: Tesaṃ vimatividhamanatthaṃ thero ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā aññāpadesena aññaṃ byākaronto “pañca chinde”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:702_1: Tattha pañca chindeti apāyūpapattinibbattanakāni pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pāde bandhanarajjukaṃ
atk-s0508a1:702_2: viya puriso satthena heṭṭhimamaggattayena chindeyya pajaheyya.
atk-s0508a1:702_3: Pañca jaheti uparidevalokūpapattihetubhūtāni pañcuddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni puriso gīvāya bandhanarajjukaṃ viya arahattamaggena jaheyya,
atk-s0508a1:702_5: Pañca cuttari bhāvayeti tesaṃyeva uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya saddhādīni pañcindriyāni uttari
atk-s0508a1:702_7: Pañcasaṅgātigoti evaṃbhūto pana pañcannaṃ rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhisaṅgānaṃ atikkamanena pahānena pañcasaṅgātigo hutvā.
atk-s0508a1:702_8: Bhikkhu oghatiṇṇoti vuccatīti sabbathā bhinnakilesatāya bhikkhūti,
atk-s0508a1:702_9: kāmabhavadiṭṭhiavijjoghe taritvā tesaṃ pārabhūte nibbāne ṭhitoti ca vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:705_0: Yathāpi bhaddo ājaññoti āyasmato belaṭṭhasīsattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:705_2: So kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:705_3: pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto upanissayasampattiyā abhāvena visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0508a1:705_4: Vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ pana bahuṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito ekatiṃse kappe vessabhuṃ
atk-s0508a1:705_6: So tena puññakammena devesu nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatito sugatiṃ upagacchanto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:705_7: buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatto bhagavato abhisambodhiyā puretarameva uruvelakassapassa
atk-s0508a1:705_8: santike tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā aggiṃ paricaranto uruvelakassapadamane ādittapariyāyadesanāya purāṇajaṭilasahassena
atk-s0508a1:710_0: “Ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:713_0: Evaṃ adhigatārahatto āyasmato dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa upajjhāyo ayaṃ thero ekadivasaṃ phalasamāpattito
atk-s0508a1:713_1: uṭṭhāya taṃ santaṃ paṇītaṃ nirāmisaṃ sukhaṃ attano pubbayogañca paccavekkhitvā pītivegavasena “yathāpi
atk-s0508a1:714_9: naṅgalaṃ ito cito ca āvattetvā khette kasanakoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:714_14: Sikhīti matthake avaṭṭhānato sikhāsadisatāya sikhā, siṅgaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:714_22: yathā “bhaddo usabhājānīyo kasane niyutto ghanatiṇamūlādikepi naṅgalapathe taṃ agaṇento appakasirena ito cito ca parivattento gacchati,
atk-s0508a1:714_24: evaṃ mamaṃ rattindivāpi appakasireneva gacchanti atikkamantī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:714_26: Yasmā kāmāmisalokāmisavaṭṭāmisehi asammissaṃ santaṃ paṇītaṃ phalasamāpattisukhaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:714_28: Paccatte cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ yathā “vanappagumbe” “tena vata re vattabbe”ti ca.
atk-s0508a1:714_29: Atha vā tato pabhuti rattindivā appakasirena gacchantīti vicāraṇāya āha –
atk-s0508a1:714_31: nirāmise sukhe laddhe sati tassa laddhakālato paṭṭhāyāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:717_2: So kira ito ekanavute kappe anuppanne tathāgate ajitassa nāma paccekabuddhassa gandhamādanato manussapathaṃ
atk-s0508a1:717_3: otaritvā aññatarasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya carantassa manoramāni ambaphalāni adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:717_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle sāsane pabbajitvā vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ bahuṃ puññaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:717_5: Evaṃ kusalakammappasuto hutvā sugatito sugatiṃ upagacchanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:717_7: So anāthapiṇḍikena gahapatinā vihārapaṭijagganakamme ṭhapito sakkaccaṃ vihāraṃ paṭijagganto abhiṇhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:717_10: “ayaṃ kassapassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto aññataraṃ khīṇāsavattheraṃ upaṭṭhahanto kiñci kammaṃ kārāpetukāmo theraṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0508a1:717_11: So tena kammena amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa dāsiyā kucchimhi nibbatto vayappatto
atk-s0508a1:717_12: seṭṭhinā vihārapaṭijaggane ṭhapito vuttanayeneva paṭiladdhasaddho ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:717_13: Mahāseṭṭhi tassa sīlācāraṃ ajjhāsayañca ñatvā bhujissaṃ katvā ‘yathāsukhaṃ pabbajā’ti āha.
atk-s0508a1:717_15: So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya kusīto hīnavīriyo hutvā na kiñci vattapaṭivattaṃ karoti,
atk-s0508a1:717_18: Dhammassavanakālepi ekaṃ koṇaṃ pavisitvā parisapariyante nisinno ghurughurupassāsī niddāyateva.
atk-s0508a1:717_19: Athassa bhagavā pubbūpanissayaṃ oloketvā saṃvegajananatthaṃ “middhī yadā hoti mahagghaso cā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:718_8: Samparivattasāyīti samparivattakaṃ samparivattakaṃ nipajjitvā ubhayenapi seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyuttoti dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:718_10: Gharasūkaro hi bālakālato paṭṭhāya posiyamāno thūlasarīrakāle gehā bahi nikkhamituṃ alabhanto heṭṭhāmañcādīsu
atk-s0508a1:718_13: yadā puriso middhī ca hoti mahagghaso ca nivāpapuṭṭho mahāvarāho viya aññena iriyāpathena yāpetuṃ asakkonto niddāyanasīlo samparivattasāyī,
atk-s0508a1:718_14: tadā so “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni manasikātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0508a1:718_15: Tesaṃ amanasikārā mandapañño punappunaṃ gabbhaṃ upeti,
atk-s0508a1:718_17: Taṃ sutvā dāsakatthero saṃvegajāto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:723_0: “Ekanavute ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:726_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā thero imāya gāthāya maṃ bhagavā ovadi,
atk-s0508a1:726_1: “ayaṃ gāthā mayhaṃ aṅkusabhūtā”ti tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:729_2: So kira ito catunavute kappe sataraṃsiṃ nāma paccekasambuddhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā attano hatthagataṃ tālaphalaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:729_3: Tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:729_4: kāle manussayoniyaṃ nibbatto sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho hutvā pabbajitvā aṭṭhikasaññaṃ bhāvesi.
atk-s0508a1:729_5: Puna imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto dārapariggahaṃ katvā ekaṃ puttaṃ labhitvā tassa “siṅgālako”ti nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:729_7: So aparabhāge gharabandhanaṃ pahāya sāsane pabbaji.
atk-s0508a1:729_8: Tassa bhagavā ajjhāsayaṃ olokento aṭṭhikasaññākammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:729_9: So taṃ gahetvā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane,
atk-s0508a1:729_10: athassa tasmiṃ vane adhivatthā devatā ussāhajananatthaṃ “bhāvanāphalaṃ nacirasseva hatthagataṃ karissatī”ti
atk-s0508a1:729_11: imamatthaṃ aññāpadesena vibhāventī “ahu buddhassa dāyādo”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:730_4: Dāyādoti dhammadāyādo navavidhassa lokuttaradhammadāyassa attano sammāpaṭipattiyā ādāyako gaṇhanako.
atk-s0508a1:730_6: Evaṃnāmassa buddhassa dāyādabhāve koci vibandho idāneva bhavissatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:730_9: Bhesakaḷāvaneti bhesakena nāma yakkhena labhitattā pariggahitattā,
atk-s0508a1:730_10: bhesakaḷānaṃ vā kaṭṭhādīnaṃ bahulatāya “bhesakaḷāvana”nti laddhanāme araññe.
atk-s0508a1:730_11: Tassa bhikkhuno buddhassa dāyādabhāve kāraṇaṃ vadanto “kevalaṃ aṭṭhisaññāya,
atk-s0508a1:730_17: Attabhāvo hi idha “pathavī”ti vutto “ko imaṃ pathaviṃ viccessatī”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0508a1:730_21: Khippameva nacirasseva kāmarāgaṃ pahissati pajahissatīti maññe. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a1:730_24: yo ekasmiṃ padese laddhāya atthikasaññāya sakalaṃ attano sabbesaṃ vā attabhāvaṃ “aṭṭhī”tveva pharitvā ṭhito,
atk-s0508a1:730_25: so bhikkhu taṃ aṭṭhikajhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanto nacireneva anāgāmimaggena kāmarāgaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:730_27: rañjanaṭṭhena “rāgo”ti ca laddhanāmaṃ taṇhaṃ aggamaggena pajahissatīti.
atk-s0508a1:730_28: Imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā so thero “ayaṃ devatā mayhaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ evamāhā”ti appaṭivānavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:738_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā tāya devatāya vuttavacanaṃ patimānento tameva gāthaṃ udānavasena abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:741_2: Ayaṃ kira thero pubbepi vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ bahuṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā adhikārasampanno vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:741_3: ākāse gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso nāḷikeraphalaṃ dātukāmo aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:741_4: Satthā tassa cittaṃ ñatvā otaritvā paṭiggaṇhi.
atk-s0508a1:741_5: So ativiya pasannacitto hutvā teneva saddhāpaṭilābhena satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci,
atk-s0508a1:741_8: So pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado samaṇadhammaṃ katvā tato cuto chapi buddhantarāni devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:741_11: So vayappatto sāsane laddhappasādo bhagavato santike pabbajitvā vikkhepabahulatāya visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0508a1:741_12: Athekadivasaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanto antarāmagge bhūmiṃ khaṇitvā udakavāhakaṃ katvā icchiticchitaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a1:741_13: udakaṃ nente purise disvā taṃ sallakkhetvā gāmaṃ paviṭṭho aññataraṃ usukāraṃ usudaṇḍakaṃ usuyante pakkhipitvā
atk-s0508a1:741_14: akkhikoṭiyā oloketvā ujuṃ karontaṃ disvā tampi sallakkhetvā gacchanto purato gantvā araneminābhiādike
atk-s0508a1:741_15: rathacakkāvayave tacchante tacchake disvā tampi sallakkhetvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā katabhattakicco pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0508a1:741_16: paṭisāmetvā divāvihāre nisinno attanā diṭṭhanimittāni upamābhāvena gahetvā attano cittadamane upanento
atk-s0508a1:741_17: “acetanaṃ udakampi manussā icchikicchitaṭṭhānaṃ nayanti tathā acetanaṃ vaṅkampi saradaṇḍaṃ upāyena namento
atk-s0508a1:741_19: tathā acetanaṃ kaṭṭhakaḷiṅgarādiṃ tacchakā nemiādivasena vaṅkaṃ ujuñca karonti.
atk-s0508a1:741_20: Atha kasmā ahaṃ sakacittaṃ ujuṃ na karissāmī”ti cintetvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:755_0: Evaṃ yāni nimittāni aṅkuse katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0508a1:755_1: tehi saddhiṃ attano cittadamanaṃ saṃsanditvā aññaṃ byākaronto “udakañhi nayanti nettikā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:756_3: Nayantīti pathaviyā taṃ taṃ thalaṭṭhānaṃ khaṇitvā ninnaṭṭhānaṃ pūretvā mātikaṃ vā katvā rukkhadoṇiṃ vā ṭhapetvā attano icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ nenti.
atk-s0508a1:756_7: nettikā attano ruciyā icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ udakaṃ nayanti,
atk-s0508a1:756_8: usukārāpi tāpetvā tejanaṃ namayanti ujuṃ karonti.
atk-s0508a1:756_9: Namanavasena tacchakā nemiādīnaṃ atthāya tacchantā dāruṃ namayanti attano ruciyā ujuṃ vā vaṅkaṃ vā karonti.
atk-s0508a1:756_10: Evaṃ ettakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā subbatā yathāsamādinnena sīlādinā sundaravatā dhīrā sotāpattimaggādīnaṃ uppādentā attānaṃ damenti,
atk-s0508a1:756_11: arahattaṃ pana pattesu ekantadantā nāma hontīti.
atk-s0508a1:759_0: Maraṇe me bhayaṃ natthīti āyasmato ajitattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:759_2: So kira ekanavute kappe vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannacitto kapitthaphalaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:759_3: Tato parampi taṃ taṃ puññaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ kappe anuppanne eva amhākaṃ satthari
atk-s0508a1:759_4: sāvatthiyaṃ mahākosalarañño aggāsaniyassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:759_6: Tasmiñca samaye sāvatthivāsī bāvarī nāma brāhmaṇo tīhi mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgato tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:759_7: pāragū sāvatthito nikkhamitvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā godhāvarītīre kapitthārāme vasati.
atk-s0508a1:759_8: Atha ajito tassa santike pabbajito atthakāmāya devatāya coditena bāvarinā satthu santikaṃ pesito tissametteyyādīhi
atk-s0508a1:759_9: saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā manasāva pañhe pucchitvā tesu vissajjitesu pasannacitto satthu santike
atk-s0508a1:759_10: pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:765_0: Arahattaṃ pana patto sīhanādaṃ nadanto “maraṇe me bhayaṃ natthī”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:766_4: Anucchinnabhavamūlānañhi “kīdisī nu kho mayhaṃ āyatiṃ uppattī”ti maraṇato bhayaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0508a1:766_6: sā natthi jīvite suparimadditasaṅkhāratāya upādānakkhandhānaṃ dukkhāsārakādibhāvena suṭṭhu upaṭṭhahanato.
atk-s0508a1:766_8: sakaṃ vā dehaṃ dehasaṅkhātaṃ dukkhabhāraṃ nikkhipissāmi chaḍḍessāmi,
atk-s0508a1:766_10: idāni taṃ ekaṃsena chaḍḍanīyamevā’ti paññāvepullappattiyā sampajāno sativepullappattiyā paṭissato nikkhipissāmī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:766_11: Imaṃ pana gāthaṃ vatvā thero jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tadanantaraṃ parinibbāyīti.
atk-s0508a1:771_0: Nāhaṃ bhayassa bhāyāmīti āyasmato nigrodhattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:771_2: Ayaṃ kira ito aṭṭhārase kappasate brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattitvā vayappatto kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme
atk-s0508a1:771_3: ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā gharabandhanaṃ pahāya araññāyatanaṃ pavisitvā aññatarasmiṃ sālavane paṇṇasālaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a1:771_5: Tena samayena piyadassī nāma sammāsambuddho loke uppajjitvā sadevakassa lokassa dhammāmatavassena kilesasantāpaṃ
atk-s0508a1:771_6: nibbāpento ekadivasaṃ tāpase anukampāya taṃ sālavanaṃ pavisitvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpanno.
atk-s0508a1:771_7: Tāpaso vanamūlaphalatthāya gacchanto bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pupphitasāladaṇḍasākhāyo gahetvā
atk-s0508a1:771_8: sālamaṇḍapaṃ katvā taṃ sabbatthakameva sālapupphehi sañchādetvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā pītisomanassavaseneva
atk-s0508a1:771_10: Satthā nirodhato vuṭṭhāya tassa anukampāya “bhikkhusaṅgho āgacchatū”ti cintesi,
atk-s0508a1:771_13: So bhikkhusaṅghampi disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:771_14: Satthā sitassa pātukaraṇāpadesena tassa bhāviniṃ sampattiṃ pakāsento dhammaṃ kathetvā pakkāmi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena.
atk-s0508a1:771_15: So tena puññakammena devamanussesuyeva saṃsaranto vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ bahuṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:771_18: So jetavanapaṭiggahaṇadivase buddhānubhāvadassanena sañjātappasādo pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:792_0: “Ko nu kho bhagavā hetu, sitakammassa satthuno;
atk-s0508a1:795_0: Tassa kammaṃ saritvāna, sitaṃ pātukariṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:797_0: Devaloke manusse vā, okāsova na sammati.
atk-s0508a1:811_0: Gotamo nāma nāmena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:831_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:834_0: Evaṃ pana chaḷabhiñño hutvā phalasukhena vītināmento sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvavibhāvanatthaṃ aññābyākaraṇavasena
atk-s0508a1:835_4: bhayato bhāyitabbanimittaṃ jātijarāmaraṇādinā hetunā nāhaṃ bhāyāmīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:835_6: Amhākaṃ satthā amate kusalo veneyyānaṃ amatadāne cheko.
atk-s0508a1:835_7: Yattha bhayaṃ nāvatiṭṭhatīti yasmiṃ nibbāne yathāvuttaṃ bhayaṃ na tiṭṭhati okāsaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0508a1:835_11: Kena pana vajantīti āha “maggena vajanti bhikkhavo”ti,
atk-s0508a1:835_12: aṭṭhaṅgikena ariyamaggena satthu ovādakaraṇā bhikkhū saṃsāre bhayassa ikkhanakāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:835_13: Yatthāti vā yaṃ nimittaṃ yassa ariyamaggassa adhigamahetu attānuvādādikaṃ pañcavīsatividhampi bhayaṃ nāvatiṭṭhati patiṭṭhaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0508a1:835_14: tena ariyena maggena vajanti abhayaṭṭhānaṃ satthu sāsane bhikkhū,
atk-s0508a1:835_16: tasmā nāhaṃ bhayassa bhāyāmīti thero aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:838_2: So kira padumuttarabuddhakālato paṭṭhāya vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ ācinanto ito ekanavute kappe manussayoniyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:838_3: nibbattitvā viññuttaṃ patto vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso pupphehi pūjaṃ katvā vanditvā
atk-s0508a1:838_4: “santadhammena nāma ettha bhavitabba”nti satthari nibbāne ca adhimucci.
atk-s0508a1:838_5: So tena puññakammena tato cuto tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatto aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:838_6: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti cittako nāma nāmena.
atk-s0508a1:838_7: So bhagavati rājagahaṃ gantvā veḷuvane viharante satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:838_8: pabbajitvā cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññāyatanaṃ pavisitvā bhāvanānuyutto jhānaṃ nibbattetvā
atk-s0508a1:838_9: jhānapādakaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacireneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:848_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthāraṃ vandituṃ rājagahaṃ upagato tattha bhikkhūhi “kiṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0508a1:848_1: araññe appamatto vihāsī”ti puṭṭho attano appamādavihāranivedanena aññaṃ byākaronto “nīlāsugīvā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:849_6: Sikhinoti matthake jātāya sikhāya sassirikabhāvena sikhino.
atk-s0508a1:849_11: Abhinadantīti pāvussakāle meghagajjitaṃ sutvā kekāsaddaṃ karontā utusampadāsiddhena sarena haṃsādike abhibhavantā viya nadanti.
atk-s0508a1:849_13: Sītavātakīḷitāti sītena meghavātena sañjātakīḷitā madhuravassitaṃ vassantā.
atk-s0508a1:849_18: “Imepi nāma niddaṃ anupagantvā jāgarantā attanā kattabbaṃ karonti,
atk-s0508a1:849_19: kimaṅgaṃ panāha”nti evaṃ sampajaññuppādanena sayanato vuṭṭhāpentīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:852_0: Ahaṃ kho veḷugumbasminti āyasmato gosālattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:852_2: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ ācinanto ito ekanavute kappe
atk-s0508a1:852_3: aññatarasmiṃ pabbate rukkhasākhāyaṃ olambamānaṃ paccekabuddhassa paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ disvā “arahaddhajo
atk-s0508a1:852_6: Tato paṭṭhāya devamanussesuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbatto gosālo nāma nāmena.
atk-s0508a1:852_7: Soṇena pana koṭikaṇṇena kataparicayattā tassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā “sopi nāma mahāvibhavo pabbajissati,
atk-s0508a1:852_8: kimaṅgaṃ panāha”nti sañjātasaṃvego bhagavato santike pabbajitvā cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sappāyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:852_9: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gavesanto attano jātagāmassa avidūre ekasmiṃ sānupabbate vihāsi.
atk-s0508a1:852_10: Tassa mātā divase divase bhikkhaṃ deti.
atk-s0508a1:852_11: Athekadivasaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa mātā madhusakkharābhisaṅkhataṃ pāyāsaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:852_12: So taṃ gahetvā tassa pabbatassa chāyāyaṃ aññatarassa veḷugumbassa mūle nisīditvā paribhuñjitvā dhovitapattapāṇī vipassanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0508a1:852_13: Bhojanasappāyalābhena kāyacittānaṃ kallatāya samāhito udayabbayañāṇādike tikkhe sūre vahante appakasireneva
atk-s0508a1:852_14: vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā bhāvanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpento saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:862_0: Arahattaṃ pana adhigantvā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ pabbatasānumeva gantukāmo attano paṭipattiṃ pavedento “ahaṃ kho veḷugumbasmi”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:863_6: Sammasanto khandhānaṃ udayabbayanti pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ udayabbayañca vipassanto,
atk-s0508a1:863_8: phalasamāpattiṃ pana samāpajjituṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapentoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:863_9: Sānuṃ paṭigamissāmīti pubbe mayā vutthapabbatasānumeva uddissa gacchissāmi.
atk-s0508a1:863_12: Evaṃ pana vatvā thero tattheva gato,
atk-s0508a1:863_13: ayameva ca imassa therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthā ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:866_2: So kira ito dvānavute kappe tissassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa kāle manussayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto migabyadhanena araññe vicarati.
atk-s0508a1:866_3: Satthā tassa anukampāya padavaḷañjaṃ dassetvā gato.
atk-s0508a1:866_4: So satthu padacetiyāni disvā purimabuddhesu katādhikāratāya “sadevake loke aggapuggalassa imāni padānī”ti
atk-s0508a1:866_5: pītisomanassajāto koraṇḍakapupphāni gahetvā pūjaṃ katvā cittaṃ pasādesi.
atk-s0508a1:866_6: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā tato cuto aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:866_7: kassapassa bhagavato kāle kuṭumbiko hutvā satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahādānaṃ pavattetvā gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0508a1:866_8: mahagghagositacandanaṃ pisitvā tena paribhaṇḍaṃ katvā patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi –
atk-s0508a1:866_10: Evaṃ aññānipi tattha tattha bhave bahūni puññakammāni katvā sugatīsu eva parivattamāno imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:866_12: Nibbattassa ca tassa mātukucchigatakālato paṭṭhāya mātu sarīraṃ sakalampi gehaṃ surabhigandhaṃ vāyati.
atk-s0508a1:866_13: Jātadivase pana visesato paramasugandhaṃ sāmantagehesupi vāyateva.
atk-s0508a1:866_14: Tassa mātāpitaro “amhākaṃ putto attanāva attano nāmaṃ gahetvā āgato”ti sugandhotveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:866_15: So anupubbena vayappatto mahāselattheraṃ disvā tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:868_0: Pasumārena jīvāmi, kusalaṃ me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a1:872_0: Haṭṭho haṭṭhena cittena, pade cittaṃ pasādayiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:882_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā aññaṃ byākaronto “anuvassiko pabbajito”ti imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:883_1: Tattha anuvassikoti anugato upagato vassaṃ anuvasso,
atk-s0508a1:883_5: Atha vā anugataṃ pacchāgataṃ apagataṃ vassaṃ anuvassaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:883_7: Yassa pabbajitassa vassaṃ aparipuṇṇatāya na gaṇanūpagataṃ,
atk-s0508a1:883_10: Passa dhammasudhammatanti tava satthu dhammassa sudhammabhāvaṃ svākkhātataṃ ekantaniyyānikataṃ passa,
atk-s0508a1:883_12: Pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇanti tisso vijjā tayā anuppattā sacchikatā,
atk-s0508a1:883_13: tato eva kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ sammāsambuddhassa sāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhi ovādo anusikkhitoti katakiccataṃ
atk-s0508a1:883_14: nissāya pītisomanassajāto thero attānaṃ paraṃ viya katvā vadatīti.
atk-s0508a1:886_2: So kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle satthari parinibbute cetiye candanasārena vedikaṃ kāretvā uḷāraṃ pūjāsakkāraṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0508a1:886_3: Tato paṭṭhāya ajjhāsayasampanno hutvā tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ bahuṃ puññakammaṃ ācinitvā devesu
atk-s0508a1:886_4: ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ sakyarājakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:886_5: Tassa mātāpitaro nandiṃ janento jātoti nandiyoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:886_6: So vayappatto anuruddhādīsu satthu santike pabbajantesu sayampi pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto katādhikāratāya nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:894_0: Omattaṃ me na passāmi, pubbakammassidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:898_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā anuruddhattherādīhi saddhiṃ pācīnavaṃsamigadāye viharante imasmiṃ there ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:898_1: māro pāpimā bhiṃsāpetukāmo tassa bheravarūpaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:898_5: tatonidānaṃ pana tvaṃ eva vighātaṃ anatthaṃ pāpuṇissasī”ti dassento “obhāsajātaṃ phalaga”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:899_1: Tattha obhāsajātanti ñāṇobhāsena jātobhāsaṃ aggamaggañāṇassa adhigatattā.
atk-s0508a1:899_2: Tena anavasesato kilesandhakārassa vihataviddhaṃsitabhāvato ativiya pabhassaranti attho.
atk-s0508a1:899_7: Tañhi nirodhaninnatāya khīṇāsavānaṃ niccakappaṃ arahattaphalasamāpattisamāpajjanato “phalena sahita”nti vattabbataṃ arahati.
atk-s0508a1:899_12: so hi kaṇhakammattā kaṇhābhijātitāya ca “kaṇho”ti vuccati.
atk-s0508a1:899_13: Dukkhaṃ nigacchasīti idha kucchianuppavesādinā niratthakaṃ kāyaparissamaṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:899_14: samparāye ca appatikāraṃ apāyadukkhaṃ upagamissasi pāpuṇissasi.
atk-s0508a1:899_15: Taṃ sutvā māro “jānāti maṃ samaṇo”ti tatthevantaradhāyīti.
atk-s0508a1:902_0: Sutvā subhāsitaṃ vācanti āyasmato abhayattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:902_2: So kira padumuttarassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā dhammakathiko hutvā dhammakathanakāle paṭhamaṃ catūhi
atk-s0508a1:902_3: gāthāhi bhagavantaṃ abhitthavitvā pacchā dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0508a1:902_4: Tenassa puññakammabalena kappānaṃ satasahassaṃ apāyapaṭisandhi nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0508a1:904_0: Na gacchi kappāni apāyabhūmiṃ, satasahassāni uḷārasaddho”ti.
atk-s0508a1:905_0: Khettasampattiyādīhi tassa ca pubbapacchimasanniṭṭhānacetanānaṃ ativiya uḷārabhāvena so aparimeyyo puññābhisando kusalābhisando tādiso ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:905_3: Tattha tattha hi bhave upacitaṃ puññaṃ tassa upatthambhakamahosi.
atk-s0508a1:905_4: Tathā hi so vipassissa bhagavato ketakapupphehi pūjamakāsi.
atk-s0508a1:905_5: Evaṃ uḷārehi puññavisesehi sugatīsu eva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rañño bimbisārassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:905_8: So nigaṇṭhena nāṭaputtena ubhatokoṭikaṃ pañhaṃ sikkhāpetvā “imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchitvā samaṇassa gotamassa
atk-s0508a1:905_9: vādaṃ āropehī”ti vissajjito bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā taṃ pañhaṃ pucchitvā tassa pañhassa anekaṃsabyākaraṇabhāve
atk-s0508a1:905_11: satthu ca sammāsambuddhabhāvaṃ viditvā upāsakattaṃ paṭivedesi.
atk-s0508a1:905_12: Tato raññe bimbisāre kālaṅkate sañjātasaṃvego sāsane pabbajitvā tālacchiggaḷūpamasuttadesanāya sotāpanno
atk-s0508a1:905_13: hutvā puna vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:913_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattikittanena aññaṃ byākaronto “sutvā subhāsitaṃ vāca”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:914_5: sammāsambuddhabhāvato mahākāruṇikatāya ca kiñci avisaṃvādetvā yathādhippetassa atthassa ekantato sādhanavasena
atk-s0508a1:914_7: Na hi saccavinimuttā bhagavato dhammadesanā atthi.
atk-s0508a1:914_9: Ādiccabandhunoti ādiccavaṃse sambhūtattā ādicco bandhu etassāti ādiccabandhu, bhagavā.
atk-s0508a1:915_0: “Yo andhakāre tamasī pabhaṅkaro, verocano maṇḍalī uggatejo;
atk-s0508a1:916_0: Mā rāhu gilī caramantalikkhe, pajaṃ mamaṃ rāhu pamuñca sūriya”nti. ;
atk-s0508a1:917_7: tasmā na dāni kiñci paṭivijjhitabbaṃ atthīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:917_8: Yathā kiṃ paṭivijjhīti āha “vālaggaṃ usunā yathā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:917_9: Yathā sattadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiṃ susikkhito kusalo issāso usunā kaṇḍena avirajjhanto vijjheyya,
atk-s0508a1:920_2: So kira ito ekanavute kappe vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso nānāpupphehi pūjetvā tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:920_3: devaloke nibbatto puna aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:920_5: Tena ca samayena satthārā bhaddekarattapaṭipadāya kathitāya aññataro bhikkhu bhaddekarattasuttavasena tena sākacchaṃ karoti.
atk-s0508a1:920_7: Asampāyanto “ahaṃ anāgate tuyhaṃ bhaddekarattaṃ kathetuṃ samattho bhaveyya”nti paṇidhānaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0508a1:920_9: Etesu paṭhamo ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle kapilavatthusmiṃ sākiyarājakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:920_10: Tassa sukhumālabhāvena soṇassa viya pādatalesu lomāni jātāni,
atk-s0508a1:920_13: Lomasakaṅgiyo anuruddhādīsu sakyakumāresu pabbajantesu pabbajituṃ na icchi.
atk-s0508a1:920_14: Atha naṃ saṃvejetuṃ candano devaputto upasaṅkamitvā bhaddekarattaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0508a1:920_16: Puna devaputto “atha kasmā tayā ‘bhaddekarattaṃ katheyya’nti saṅgaro kato,
atk-s0508a1:920_17: idāni pana nāmamattampi na jānāsī”ti codesi.
atk-s0508a1:920_20: pubbe ‘imassa bhaddekarattaṃ kathessāmī’ti saṅgaro kato”ti pucchi.
atk-s0508a1:920_23: kassapassa bhagavato kāle tayā evaṃ kata”nti āha.
atk-s0508a1:920_28: tathāgatā mātāpitūhi ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ pabbājentī”ti paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0508a1:920_29: So mātu santikaṃ gantvā “anujānāhi maṃ, amma,
atk-s0508a1:920_34: “attano parissayasahanabhāvaṃ pakāsento “dabbaṃ kusaṃ poṭakila”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:921_8: Dabbādīni tiṇāni bīraṇatiṇāni pādehi akkantassāpi dukkhajanakāni gamanantarāyakarāni ca,
atk-s0508a1:921_9: tāni ca panāhaṃ urasā panudissāmi urasāpi apanessāmi.
atk-s0508a1:921_10: Evaṃ apanento taṃ nimittaṃ dukkhaṃ sahanto araññāyatane gumbantaraṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissāmi.
atk-s0508a1:921_11: Ko pana vādo pādehi akkamaneti dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:921_13: Gaṇasaṅgaṇikañhi pahāya kāyavivekaṃ anubrūhayantasseva aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu yattha katthaci cittaṃ samādahantassa cittaviveko,
atk-s0508a1:921_15: Samāhitasseva vipassanāya kammaṃ karontassa samathavipassanañca yuganaddhaṃ karontassa kilesānaṃ khepanena upadhivivekādhigamo,
atk-s0508a1:921_17: Tena vuttaṃ “vivekamanubrūhayanti kāyavivekaṃ cittavivekaṃ upadhivivekañca anubrūhayanto”ti.
atk-s0508a1:921_18: Evaṃ pana puttena vutte mātā “tena hi, tāta,
atk-s0508a1:921_22: Taṃ pabbajitvā katapubbakiccaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisantaṃ bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “āvuso,
atk-s0508a1:921_23: tvaṃ sukhumālo kiṃ sakkhissasi araññe vasitu”nti.
atk-s0508a1:921_24: So tesampi tameva gāthaṃ vatvā araññaṃ pavisitvā bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:927_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā thero aññaṃ byākaronto taṃyeva gāthaṃ abhāsīti.
atk-s0508a1:930_0: Kacci no vatthapasutoti āyasmato jambugāmiyaputtattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:930_2: So kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro hutvā tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ ācinanto ito ekatiṃse
atk-s0508a1:930_3: kappe vessabhussa bhagavato kāle ekadivasaṃ kiṃsukāni pupphāni disvā tāni pupphāni gahetvā buddhaguṇe
atk-s0508a1:930_4: anussaranto bhagavantaṃ uddissa ākāse khipanto pūjesi.
atk-s0508a1:930_6: Tato paraṃ puññāni katvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde campāyaṃ jambugāmiyassa nāma upāsakassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:930_8: Tato paraṃ puññāni katvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde campāyaṃ jambugāmiyassa nāma upāsakassa putvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:930_10: So vayappatto bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaṃvego pabbajitvā katapubbakicco kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sākete añjanavane vasati.
atk-s0508a1:930_11: Athassa pitā “kiṃ nu kho mama putto sāsane abhirato viharati,
atk-s0508a1:930_12: udāhu no”ti vīmaṃsanatthaṃ “kacci no vatthapasuto”ti gāthaṃ likhitvā pesesi.
atk-s0508a1:930_15: ahañca ajjāpi puthujjanabhūmiṃ nātivatto”ti saṃvegajāto ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:938_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā ñātīnaṃ vasananagaraṃ gantvā sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ pakāsento iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0508a1:938_1: Taṃ disvā ñātakā pasannamānasā bahū saṅghārāme kāresuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:938_2: Theropi sakapitarā pesitaṃ gāthaṃ aṅkusaṃ katvā ghaṭento vāyamanto arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:938_3: Aññaṃ byākarontopi pitupūjanatthaṃ “kacci no vatthapasuto”ti tameva gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:939_9: yathekacce pabbajitvāpi capalā kāyadaḷhibahulā cīvarādiparikkhārassa attano sarīrassa ca maṇḍanavibhūsanaṭṭhānāya yuttā honti.
atk-s0508a1:939_10: Kimeva parikkhārapasuto bhūsanārato ca nāhosīti ayamettha padadvayassāpi attho.
atk-s0508a1:939_11: Sīlamayaṃ gandhanti akhaṇḍādibhāvāpādanena suparisuddhassa catubbidhassapi sīlassa vasena yvāyaṃ “yo ca sīlavataṃ pajāti na itarā dussīlapajā,
atk-s0508a1:939_13: evaṃ tvaṃ duggandhaṃ avāyitvā kacci sīlamayaṃ gandhaṃ vāyasīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:939_14: Atha vā netarā pajāti na itarā dussīlapajā,
atk-s0508a1:939_16: yato sīlamayaṃ gandhaṃ vāyasīti byatirekena sīlagandhavāyanameva vibhāveti.
atk-s0508a1:942_2: So kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro hutvā tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññasambhāraṃ upacinanto ito
atk-s0508a1:942_3: ekatiṃse kappe sudassanaṃ nāma paccekasambuddhaṃ disvā pasannamānaso kuṭajapupphehi pūjaṃ katvā tena
atk-s0508a1:942_4: puññakammena sugatīsuyeva parivattento imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthinagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:942_6: Tassa vayappattassa mātāpitaro kularūpādīhi anucchavikaṃ kumārikaṃ brāhmaṇadhītaraṃ ānesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:942_7: So tāya saddhiṃ bhogasukhaṃ anubhavanto ekadivasaṃ attano tassā ca rūpasampattiṃ oloketvā dhammatāya
atk-s0508a1:942_8: codiyamāno “īdisaṃ nāma rūpaṃ nacirasseva jarāya maccunā ca abhippamaddīyatī”ti saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0508a1:942_9: Katipayadivasātikkameneva cassa bhariyaṃ kaṇhasappo ḍaṃsitvā māresi.
atk-s0508a1:942_10: So tena bhiyyosomattāya sañjātasaṃvego satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā gharabandhane chinditvā pabbaji.
atk-s0508a1:942_11: Tassa ca cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā viharantassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ na sampajjati,
atk-s0508a1:942_13: So gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho aññataraṃ usukāraṃ usudaṇḍaṃ yante pakkhipitvā ujuṃ karontaṃ disvā “ime acetanampi nāma ujuṃ karonti,
atk-s0508a1:942_14: kasmā ahaṃ cittaṃ ujuṃ na karissāmī”ti cintetvā tatova paṭinivattitvā divāṭṭhāne nisinno vipassanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0508a1:942_15: Athassa bhagavā upari ākāse nisīditvā ovādaṃ dento “samunnamayamattāna”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:942_16: Ayameva thero attānaṃ paraṃ viya ovadanto abhāsīti ca vadanti.
atk-s0508a1:943_2: samāpattivasena kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā tato uddharanto vīriyasamataṃ yojentoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:943_4: atha vā samunnamayāti kosajjapakkhato samunnamehi. Ma-
atk-s0508a1:943_6: Hīnavīriyatāya tava cittaṃ kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ nappaṭipajjati ce,
atk-s0508a1:943_12: Yathā nāma usukāro kaṇḍaṃ īsakampi onataṃ apanatañca vijjhanto lakkhaṃ bhindanatthaṃ ujuṃ karoti,
atk-s0508a1:943_13: evaṃ kosajjapātato arakkhaṇena onataṃ uddhaccapātato arakkhaṇena apanataṃ vijjhanto appanāpattiyā cittaṃ
atk-s0508a1:943_14: ujuṃ karitvāna samāhitacitto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā sīghaṃ aggamaggañāṇena avijjaṃ bhinda padālehīti.
atk-s0508a1:943_15: Taṃ sutvā thero vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacireneva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:953_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā aññaṃ byākarontopi tameva gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:956_0: Ābādhe me samuppanneti āyasmato uttiyattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:956_2: So kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito catunavute kappe
atk-s0508a1:956_3: siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle candabhāgāya nadiyā mahārūpo susumāro hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0508a1:956_4: So pāraṃ gantuṃ nadiyā tīraṃ upagataṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto pāraṃ netukāmo tīrasamīpe nipajji.
atk-s0508a1:956_5: Bhagavā tassa anukampāya piṭṭhiyaṃ pāde ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a1:956_6: So haṭṭho udaggo pītivegena diguṇussāho hutvā sotaṃ chindanto sīghena javena bhagavantaṃ paratīraṃ nesi.
atk-s0508a1:956_7: Bhagavā tassa cittappasādaṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ ito cuto devaloke nibbattitvā tato paṭṭhāya sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:956_8: ito catunavute kappe amataṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:957_0: So tathā sugatīsuyeva paribbhamanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti uttiyo nāma nāmena.
atk-s0508a1:957_1: So vayappatto “amataṃ pariyesissāmī”ti paribbājako hutvā vicaranto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a1:957_2: dhammaṃ sutvā sāsane pabbajitvāpi sīlādīnaṃ avisodhitattā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto aññe bhikkhū
atk-s0508a1:957_3: visesaṃ nibbattetvā aññaṃ byākaronte disvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā saṅkhepeneva ovādaṃ yāci.
atk-s0508a1:957_6: So tassa ovāde ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0508a1:957_8: Uppanne pana ābādhe sañjātasaṃvego vīriyārambhavatthuṃ katvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:979_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano sammā paṭipattiyā paripuṇṇākāravibhāvanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto “ābādhe me samuppanne”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:980_1: Tattha ābādhe me samuppanneti sarīrassa ābādhanato “ābādho”ti laddhanāme visabhāgadhātukkhobhahetuke roge mayhaṃ sañjāte.
atk-s0508a1:980_2: Sati me udapajjathāti “uppanno kho me ābādho,
atk-s0508a1:980_6: handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi ‘appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā”’ti
atk-s0508a1:980_7: vīriyārambhavatthubhūtā sati tasseva ābādhassa vasena dukkhāya vedanāya pīḷiyamānassa mayhaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0508a1:980_10: Evaṃ uppannañhi satiṃ aṅkusaṃ katvā ayaṃ thero arahattaṃ pattoti.
atk-s0508a1:985_2: So kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro ito ekatiṃse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle migaluddo hutvā araññe
atk-s0508a1:985_3: vicaranto addasa sikhiṃ bhagavantaṃ aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle devanāgayakkhānaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:985_4: disvā pana pasannamānaso “dhammo esa vuccatī”ti sare nimittaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0508a1:985_5: So tena cittappasādena devaloke uppanno puna aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:985_6: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā “aggidatto”ti laddhanāmo vayappatto bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā sañjātappasādo
atk-s0508a1:985_7: sāsane pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gahvaratīre nāma araññaṭṭhāne vasati.
atk-s0508a1:985_9: So vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:991_0: Tattha cittaṃ pasādetvā, uttariṃ duttaraṃ bhavaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:995_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā sāvatthiyaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a1:995_1: Tassa āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā ñātakā upagantvā mahādānaṃ pavattesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:995_2: So katipayadivase vasitvā araññameva gantukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:995_6: Taṃ sutvā thero “araññavāsoyeva mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti vivekābhiratikittanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto “phuṭṭho ḍaṃsehī”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:996_1: Tattha phuṭṭho ḍaṃsehi makasehīti ḍaṃsanasīlatāya “ḍaṃsā”ti laddhanāmāhi andhakamakkhikāhi,
atk-s0508a1:996_2: makasanaññitehi ca sūcimukhapāṇehi phussito daṭṭhoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:996_5: Nāgo saṅgāmasīsevāti saṅgāmāvacaro hatthināgo viya saṅgāmamuddhani parasenāsampahāraṃ.
atk-s0508a1:996_6: “Araññavāso nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇito thomito”ti ussāhajāto sato satimā hutvā tatra tasmiṃ araññe,
atk-s0508a1:996_7: tasmiṃ vā ḍaṃsādisamphasse upaṭṭhite adhivāsaye adhivāseyya saheyya,
atk-s0508a1:996_8: “ḍaṃsādayo maṃ ābādhentī”ti araññavāsaṃ na jaheyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:999_2: So kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññāyatane vasanto
atk-s0508a1:999_3: tattha bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso phalāphalaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0508a1:999_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa kāle khattiyakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:999_6: anukkamena viññutaṃ patto kalyāṇamittasannissayena laddhasaṃvego sāsane pabbajitvā bahussuto ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:999_7: Jātimadena sutamadena ca attānaṃ ukkaṃsento pare ca vambhento vihāsi.
atk-s0508a1:999_8: So imasmiṃ buddhuppāde tassa kammassa nissandena sāvatthiyaṃ paribhūtarūpe susānagopakakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:999_10: Atha viññutaṃ patto attano sahāyabhūtaṃ sopākattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaṃvego
atk-s0508a1:999_11: pabbajitvā sammāpaṭipattiṃ pūretvā “ajaraṃ jīramānenā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1000_4: etasmiṃ vā adhigate puggalassa sā natthīti jarābhāvahetutopi ajaraṃ nāma.
atk-s0508a1:1000_16: tathā rāgaggiādīhi santappamānena gato evaṃ aniccena dukkhena asārena sabbathāpi anupasantasabhāvena saupaddavena,
atk-s0508a1:1000_17: tappaṭipakkhabhāvato ajaraṃ paramupasamabhūtaṃ kenaci anupaddutaṃ anuttaraṃ nibbānaṃ nimiyaṃ parivatteyyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1000_18: “mahā vata me lābho mahā udayo hatthagato”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1000_19: Yathā hi manussā yaṃ kiñci bhaṇḍaṃ parivattentā nirapekkhā gayhamānena sambahumānā honti,
atk-s0508a1:1000_20: evamayaṃ thero pahitatto viharanto attano kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkhataṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1000_22: yogakkhemaṃ anuttara”nti vatvā tameva paṭipattiṃ paribrūhayanto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1014_0: Paribhutte ca saṅghamhi, puññaṃ tava bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:1020_0: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, phaladānassidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1026_0: Kumbhaṇḍā garuḷā cāpi, pāricariyaṃ upenti me.
atk-s0508a1:1027_0: “Kummā soṇā madhukārā, ḍaṃsā ca makasā ubho;
atk-s0508a1:1030_0: Tepi maṃ saraṇaṃ yanti, phaladānassidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1036_0: Sabbe maṃ saraṇaṃ yanti, phaladānassidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1050_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvāpi tameva gāthaṃ aññābyākaraṇavasena abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1053_2: So kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro hutvā tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto kakusandhassa
atk-s0508a1:1053_3: bhagavato kāle aññatarassa kuṭumbikassa putto hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a1:1053_6: So bhikkhusaṅghe ca abhippasanno salākabhattaṃ paṭṭhapetvā saṅghuddesavasena tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ khīrabhattaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1053_7: So tehi puññakammehi aparāparaṃ devamanussesu sampattiṃ anubhavanto ekadā manussayoniyaṃ nibbatto ekassa paccekabuddhassa khīrabhattaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1053_8: Evaṃ tattha tattha puññāni katvā sugatīsu eva paribbhamanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde purimakammanissandena
atk-s0508a1:1053_9: sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarāya duggatitthiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a1:1053_10: Tassa mātā dasa māse kucchinā pariharitvā paripakke gabbhe vijāyanakāle vijāyituṃ asakkontī mucchaṃ āpajjitvā bahuvelaṃ matā viya nipajji.
atk-s0508a1:1053_11: Taṃ ñātakā “matā”ti saññāya susānaṃ netvā citakaṃ āropetvā devatānubhāvena vātavuṭṭhiyā uṭṭhitāya aggiṃ adatvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:1053_12: Dārako pacchimabhāvikattā devatānubhāvena mātukucchito arogo nikkhami.
atk-s0508a1:1053_14: Devatā taṃ gahetvā manussarūpena susānagopakassa gehe ṭhapetvā katipayakālaṃ patirūpena āhārena posesi.
atk-s0508a1:1053_15: Tato paraṃ susānagopako ca naṃ attano puttaṃ katvā vaḍḍheti.
atk-s0508a1:1053_16: So tathā vaḍḍhento tassa puttena supiyena nāma dārakena saddhiṃ kīḷanto vicarati.
atk-s0508a1:1053_17: Tassa susāne jātasaṃvaḍḍhabhāvato sopākoti samaññā ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:1054_0: Athekadivasaṃ sattavassikaṃ taṃ bhagavā paccūsavelāya ñāṇajālaṃ pattharitvā veneyyabandhave oloketvā ñāṇajalantogadhaṃ disvā susānaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1054_1: Dārako pubbahetunā codiyamāno pasannamānaso satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1054_3: So dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā “pitarā anuññātosī”ti vutto pitaraṃ satthu santikaṃ nesi.
atk-s0508a1:1054_7: So mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā susāne viharanto ca cirasseva mettājhānaṃ nibbattetvā jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1064_0: Arahā hutvā pana aññesaṃ sosānikabhikkhūnaṃ mettābhāvanāvidhiṃ dassento “yathāpi ekaputtasmi”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1065_2: Ekaputtasminti punāti ca kulavaṃsaṃ tāyati cāti putto,
atk-s0508a1:1065_7: Piyasminti piyāyitabbatāya ceva ekaputtatāya ca rūpasīlācārādīhi ca pemakaraṇaṭṭhānabhūte.
atk-s0508a1:1065_12: Sabbatthāti sabbāsu disāsu sabbesu vā bhavādīsu,
atk-s0508a1:1065_15: yathā ekaputtake piye manāpe mātāpitā kusalī ekantahitesī bhaveyya,
atk-s0508a1:1065_17: kāmabhavādibhedesu sabbesu bhavesu daharādibhedāsu sabbāsu avatthāsu ca ṭhitesu sabbesu sattesu ekantahitesitāya kusalī bhaveyya,
atk-s0508a1:1065_18: “mitto udāsīno pañcatthiko”ti sīmaṃ akatvā sīmāsambhedavasena sabbattha ekarasaṃ mettaṃ bhāveyyāti.
atk-s0508a1:1065_19: Imaṃ pana gāthaṃ vatvā “sace tumhe āyasmanto evaṃ mettābhāvanaṃ anuyuñjeyyātha,
atk-s0508a1:1065_20: ye te bhagavatā ‘sukhaṃ supatī’tiādinā ekādasa mettānisaṃsā vuttā,
atk-s0508a1:1068_2: So kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ bahuṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā sugatīsu
atk-s0508a1:1068_3: eva saṃsaranto ito dvenavute kappe tissassa bhagavato kāle migaluddo hutvā araññe vicarati.
atk-s0508a1:1068_4: Atha bhagavā tassa anuggahaṃ kātuṃ araññaṃ gantvā tassa cakkhupathe attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0508a1:1068_5: So bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto āvudhaṃ nikkhipitvā upasaṅkamitvā añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1068_7: So tāvadeva tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā same bhūmibhāge sakkaccaṃ santharitvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1068_9: Nisinne pana bhagavati anappakaṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedento bhagavantaṃ vanditvā sayampi ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:1068_10: Atha bhagavā “ettakaṃ vaṭṭati imassa kusalabīja”nti uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:1068_11: Acirapakkante bhagavati taṃ sīho migarājā ghātesi.
atk-s0508a1:1068_13: “So kira bhagavati anupagacchante sīhena ghātito niraye nibbattissatī”ti taṃ disvā bhagavā sugatiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1069_0: So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato devalokato cavitvā sugatīsuyeva parivattento imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1069_1: aññatarassa mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino putto saṅgāmajitattherassa kaniṭṭhabhātā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:1069_3: So vayappatto dārapariggahaṃ katvā ekaṃ puttaṃ labhitvā antimabhavikatāya dhammatāya codiyamāno jātiādiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1069_4: paṭicca uppannasaṃvego pabbajitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā vūpakaṭṭho hutvā catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto
atk-s0508a1:1077_0: Sohena pothito, santo tattha kālaṅkato ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1089_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā bhagavantaṃ vandituṃ sāvatthiṃ āgato ñātiṃ anukampāya ñātigehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1089_1: Tattha naṃ purāṇadutiyikā vanditvā āsanadānādinā paṭhamaṃ upāsikā viya vattaṃ dassetvā therassa ajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1089_3: Thero “aho andhabālā mādisepi nāma evaṃ paṭipajjatī”ti cintetvā kiñci avatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā araññameva gato.
atk-s0508a1:1089_7: Thero tattha pavattiṃ ācikkhanto “anāsannavarā etā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1090_1: Tattha anāsannavarāti etā itthiyo na āsannā anupagatā,
atk-s0508a1:1090_2: dūre eva vā ṭhitā hutvā varā purisassa seṭṭhā hitāvahā,
atk-s0508a1:1090_13: te pana upasaṅkamantā diṭṭhadhammikaṃyeva anatthaṃ kareyyuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1090_14: Itthiyo pana upasaṅkamitvā diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikaṃ vimokkhanissitampi atthaṃ vināsetvā mahantaṃ anatthaṃ āpādenti,
atk-s0508a1:1090_23: Anāmantetvāti anālapitvā purāṇadutiyikaṃ “appamattā hohī”ti ettakampi avatvā.
atk-s0508a1:1090_27: Ye pana “sā itthī theraṃ gharaṃ upagataṃ bhojetvā palobhetukāmā jātā,
atk-s0508a1:1090_28: taṃ disvā thero tāvadeva gehato nikkhamitvā vihāraṃ gantvā attano vasanaṭṭhāne mañcake nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:1090_29: Sāpi kho itthī pacchābhattaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattā vihāre therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0508a1:1090_30: Taṃ disvā thero kiñci avatvā uṭṭhāya divāṭṭhānameva gato”ti vadanti,
atk-s0508a1:1090_31: tesaṃ “gāmā araññamāgammā”ti gāthāpadassa attho yathārutavaseneva niyyati.
atk-s0508a1:1093_2: So kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro hutvā tattha tattha bhave kusalaṃ upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa
atk-s0508a1:1093_3: bhagavato kāle manussayoniyaṃ nibbatto vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso ekaṃ mañcaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1093_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde aññatarassa paribbājakassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:1093_6: So viññutaṃ patto satthu yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā pasannamānaso sāsane pabbajitvā cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1093_7: gahetvā jhānaṃ nibbattetvā jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1095_0: Ekaṃ mañcaṃ mayā dinnaṃ, pasannena sapāṇinā.
atk-s0508a1:1101_0: Therassa pana gihisahāyako kātiyāno nāma paribbājako buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya titthiyānaṃ hatalābhasakkāratāya
atk-s0508a1:1101_1: ghāsacchādanamattampi alabhanto ājīvakāpakato theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “tumhe sākiyaputtiyā nāma mahālābhaggayasaggappattā
atk-s0508a1:1101_4: kathaṃ nu kho paṭipajjamānassa diṭṭhadhammikañceva samparāyikañca sukhaṃ sampajjatī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0508a1:1101_6: tañca tadanurūpaṃ paṭipattiṃ paṭipajjantassevā”ti attanā tassa adhigatabhāvaṃ pariyāyena vibhāvento “sukhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1102_3: Tathā hi “ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko” “nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukha”nti ca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1102_9: Ko pana atthikoti āha “tadācara”nti tadatthaṃ ācaranto,
atk-s0508a1:1102_10: yāya paṭipattiyā taṃ paṭipattiṃ paṭipajjantoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:1102_12: atha kho kittiñca pappoti “itipi sīlavā suparisuddhakāyavacīkammanto suparisuddhājīvo jhāyī jhānayutto”tiādinā
atk-s0508a1:1102_14: Yasassa vaḍḍhatīti sammukhe guṇābhitthavasaṅkhāto parivārasampadāsaṅkhāto ca yaso assa paribrūhati.
atk-s0508a1:1102_18: Tassattho yo puggalo kilesehi ārakattā parisuddhaṭṭhena paṭipajjantānaṃ ariyabhāvakaraṇaṭṭhena ariyaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1102_22: nibbānatthikehi magganiyaṭṭhena kilese mārento gamanaṭṭhena ca “magga”nti laddhanāmaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1102_23: amatassa asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā pattiyā adhigamāya bhāveti attano santāne uppādeti vaḍḍheti ca,
atk-s0508a1:1102_26: Taṃ sutvā paribbājako pasannamānaso pabbajitvā sammā paṭipajjanto nacirasseva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1105_2: So kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro ito ekanavute kappe ajinacammavasano tāpaso hutvā bandhumatīnagare
atk-s0508a1:1105_3: rājuyyāne vasanto vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso pādabbhañjanatelaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1105_5: Tato paṭṭhāya sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde avantiraṭṭhe veḷukaṇṭakanagare gahapatikule nibbatto.
atk-s0508a1:1105_9: So āyasmato sāriputtassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā laddhappasādo pabbajitvā katapubbakicco pariyantapabbatapasse
atk-s0508a1:1105_10: samaṇadhammaṃ karonto visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1105_11: sodhetvā sappāyaṭṭhāne vasanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1109_0: Padhānaṃ pahitattaṃ taṃ, jhāyiṃ jhānarataṃ vasiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1115_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā araññe kāyadaḷhibahule bhikkhū,
atk-s0508a1:1115_1: disvā te ovadanto sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ pakāsento “sādhu sutaṃ sādhu caritaka”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1116_3: Tañca kho vivaṭṭūpanissitaṃ visesato appicchatādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dasakathāvatthusavanaṃ idhādhippetaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1116_9: Aniketavihāroti kilesānaṃ nivāsanaṭṭhānaṭṭhena pañcakāmaguṇā niketā nāma,
atk-s0508a1:1116_14: Atthapucchananti taṃ ājānitukāmassa kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthapabhedassa pucchanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1116_15: kusalādibhedassa vā atthassa sabhāvadhammassa “kiṃ, bhante, kusalaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1116_19: Padakkhiṇakammanti taṃ pana pucchitvā padakkhiṇaggāhibhāvena tassa ovāde adhiṭṭhānaṃ sammāpaṭipatti.
atk-s0508a1:1116_21: Etaṃ sāmaññanti “sādhu suta”ntiādinā vuttaṃ yaṃ sutaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1119_2: So kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto ito catunavute
atk-s0508a1:1119_3: kappe siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto araññaṃ pavisitvā bahuṃ rukkhadaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1119_5: Aññañca yathāvibhavaṃ puññaṃ katvā devesu nibbattitvā tato paṭṭhāya sugatīsuyeva parivattento imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1119_9: So kumāputtassa piyasahāyo hutvā vicaranto “kumāputto pabbajito”ti sutvā “na hi nūna so orako dhammavinayo,
atk-s0508a1:1119_10: yattha kumāputto pabbajito”ti tadanubandhena sayampi pabbajitukāmo hutvā satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0508a1:1119_12: So bhiyyosomattāya pabbajjāya sañjātachando pabbajitvā kumāputteneva saddhiṃ pariyantapabbate bhāvanānuyutto viharati.
atk-s0508a1:1119_13: Tena ca samayena sambahulā bhikkhū nānājanapadesu janapadacārikaṃ carantāpi gacchantāpi āgacchantāpi taṃ ṭhānaṃ upagacchanti.
atk-s0508a1:1119_15: Taṃ disvā sudantatthero “ime bhikkhū niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā janapadavitakkaṃ anuvattentā cittasamādhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1119_16: virādhentī”ti saṃvegajāto tameva saṃvegaṃ attano cittadamanassa aṅkusaṃ karonto “nānājanapadaṃ yantī”ti
atk-s0508a1:1120_1: Tattha nānājanapadanti visuṃ visuṃ nānāvidhaṃ janapadaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1120_6: Asaññatāti tasseva janapadavitakkassa appahīnatāya cittena asaṃyatā.
atk-s0508a1:1120_7: Samādhiñca virādhentīti sabbassapi uttarimanussadhammassa mūlabhūtaṃ upacārappanābhedaṃ samādhiñca nāma virādhenti. Ca-
atk-s0508a1:1120_9: Desantaracaraṇena jhāyituṃ okāsābhāvena anadhigataṃ samādhiṃ nādhigacchantā,
atk-s0508a1:1120_15: Tasmāti yasmā īdisī desantaracariyā bhikkhussa na atthāvahā,
atk-s0508a1:1120_16: api ca kho anatthāvahā sampattīnaṃ virādhanato, tasmā.
atk-s0508a1:1120_17: Vineyya sārambhanti vasanapadese arativasena uppannaṃ sārambhaṃ cittasaṃkilesaṃ tadanurūpena paṭisaṅkhānena vinetvā vūpasametvā.
atk-s0508a1:1120_18: Jhāyeyyāti ārammaṇūpanijjhānena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena cāti duvidhenapi jhānena jhāyeyya.
atk-s0508a1:1120_19: Apurakkhatoti micchāvitakkehi taṇhādīhi vā na purakkhatoti tesaṃ vasaṃ anupagacchanto kammaṭṭhānameva manasi kareyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:1120_20: Evaṃ pana vatvā thero tameva saṃvegaṃ aṅkusaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1128_0: Yaṃ panatthaṃ aṅkusaṃ katvā ayaṃ thero arahattaṃ patto,
atk-s0508a1:1128_1: tamevatthaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pattopi “nānājanapadaṃ yanti”ti idameva gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1131_0: Yo iddhiyā sarabhunti āyasmato gavampatittherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:1131_2: So kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro ito ekatiṃse kappe sikhiṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso pupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1131_3: So tena puññakammena devaloke uppanno aparāparaṃ puññāni karonto koṇāgamanassa bhagavato cetiye chattañca vedikañca kāresi.
atk-s0508a1:1131_4: Kassapassa pana bhagavato kāle aññatarasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto.
atk-s0508a1:1131_7: Ayaṃ tattha antarantarā yuttappayuttaṃ vicārento vicarati.
atk-s0508a1:1131_8: So ekaṃ khīṇāsavattheraṃ gāme piṇḍāya caritvā bahigāme devasikaṃ ekasmiṃ padese bhattakiccaṃ karontaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1131_9: disvā “ayyo sūriyātapena kilamissatī”ti cintetvā cattāro sirīsadaṇḍe ussāpetvā tesaṃ upari sirīsasākhāyo
atk-s0508a1:1131_12: Tassa anukampāya devasikaṃ thero tattha nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:1131_13: So tena puññakammena tato cavitvā cātumahārājikesu nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:1131_14: Tassa purimakammasaṃsūcakaṃ vimānadvāre mahantaṃ sirīsavanaṃ nibbatti vaṇṇagandhasampannehi aññehi pupphehi sabbakāle upasobhayamānaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1131_16: So devaputto ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde yasattherassa catūsu
atk-s0508a1:1131_17: gihisahāyesu gavampati nāma hutvā āyasmato yasassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā attano sahāyehi saddhiṃ bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:1131_20: So desanāvasāne sahāyehi saddhiṃ arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1139_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā thero vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento sākete viharati añjanavane.
atk-s0508a1:1139_1: Tena ca samayena bhagavā mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ sāketaṃ gantvā añjanavane vihāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1139_3: Sambahulā bhikkhū vihārasāmantā sarabhuyā nadiyā vālikāpuḷine sayiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:1139_4: Atha aḍḍharattasamaye nadiyā udakoghe āgacchante sāmaṇerādayo uccāsaddamahāsaddā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1139_5: Bhagavā taṃ ñatvā āyasmantaṃ gavampatiṃ āṇāpesi – “gaccha,
atk-s0508a1:1139_11: Tato paṭṭhāya therassa ānubhāvo loke pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:1139_12: Athekadivasaṃ satthā mahatiyā devaparisāya majjhe nisīditvā dhammaṃ desentaṃ theraṃ disvā lokānukampāya
atk-s0508a1:1139_13: tassa guṇānaṃ vibhāvanatthaṃ taṃ pasaṃsanto “yo iddhiyā sarabhu”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1140_4: Aṭṭhapesīti sandituṃ adento sotaṃ nivattetvā pabbatakūṭaṃ viya mahantaṃ jalarāsiṃ katvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a1:1140_7: bandhanasaṅkhātānaṃ vā sabbasaṃyojanānaṃ samucchinnattā kenacipi bandhanena abaddho,
atk-s0508a1:1140_8: tato eva ejānaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvato anejo so,
atk-s0508a1:1140_10: taṃ sabbasaṅgātigataṃ tādisaṃ sabbepi rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhisaṅge atikkamitvā ṭhitattā sabbasaṅgātigataṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1140_12: tato eva kāmakammabhavādibhedassa sakalassapi bhavassa pāraṃ nibbānaṃ gatattā bhavassa pāraguṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1141_1: Thero aññaṃ byākaronto “satthāraṃ pūjessāmī”ti imameva gāthaṃ abhāsīti.
atk-s0508a1:1144_0: Sattiyā viya omaṭṭhoti āyasmato tissattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:1144_2: Ayampi kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto tissassa
atk-s0508a1:1144_3: bhagavato bodhiyā mūle purāṇapaṇṇāni nīharitvā sodhesi.
atk-s0508a1:1144_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare bhagavato pitucchāputto hutvā nibbatti tisso nāma nāmena.
atk-s0508a1:1144_5: So bhagavantaṃ anupabbajitvā upasampanno hutvā araññāyatane viharanto jātiṃ paṭicca mānaṃ karonto kodhūpāyāsabahulo
atk-s0508a1:1144_8: Atha naṃ satthā ekadivasaṃ divāṭṭhāne vivaṭamukhaṃ niddāyantaṃ dibbacakkhunā olokento sāvatthito ākāsena
atk-s0508a1:1144_9: gantvā tassa upari ākāseyeva ṭhatvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā tenobhāsena paṭibuddhassa satiṃ uppādetvā ovādaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1145_4: Cattāro hi pahārā omaṭṭho ummaṭṭho maṭṭho vimaṭṭhoti.
atk-s0508a1:1145_5: Tattha upari ṭhatvā adhomukhaṃ dinnapahāro omaṭṭho nāma,
atk-s0508a1:1145_6: heṭṭhā ṭhatvā uddhammukhaṃ dinnapahāro ummaṭṭho nāma,
atk-s0508a1:1145_7: aggaḷasūci viya vinivijjhitvā gato maṭṭho nāma,
atk-s0508a1:1145_10: So hi sabbadāruṇo duruddharaṇasallo duttikiccho antodoso antopubbalohitova hoti,
atk-s0508a1:1145_12: Pubbalohitaṃ nīharitukāmehi mañcena saddhiṃ bandhitvā adhosiro kātabbo hoti,
atk-s0508a1:1145_13: maraṇaṃ vā maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0508a1:1145_17: yathā sattiyā omaṭṭho puriso sallubbāhanavaṇatikicchanānaṃ atthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati tādisaṃ payogaṃ karoti parakkamati,
atk-s0508a1:1145_18: yathā ca ḍayhamāne matthake ādittasīso puriso tassa nibbāpanatthaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhati tādisaṃ payogaṃ karoti, evamevaṃ, bhikkhu,
atk-s0508a1:1145_19: kāmarāgappahānāya sato appamatto ativiya ussāhajāto hutvā vihareyyāti.
atk-s0508a1:1146_0: Evaṃ bhagavā tassa therassa kodhūpāyāsavūpasamāya ovādaṃ dento tadekaṭṭhatāya kāmarāgappahānasīsena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0508a1:1146_1: Thero imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā saṃviggahadayo vipassanāya yuttappayutto vihāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1146_2: Tassa ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā satthā saṃyuttake tissattherasuttaṃ desesi.
atk-s0508a1:1148_0: Avasāne ca nibbānaṃ, sivaṃ patto anuttaraṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1150_0: Yo puññaṃ pasavī poso, tassa kiṃ nāma dullabhaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1156_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā thero aññaṃ byākaronto satthāraṃ pūjetuṃ tameva gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1159_0: Sattiyā viya omaṭṭhoti āyasmato vaḍḍhamānattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:1159_2: Ayampi kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro ito dvenavute kappe tissassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:1159_3: viññutaṃ patto tissaṃ bhagavantaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso suparipakkāni vaṇṭato muttāni
atk-s0508a1:1159_5: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ puññakammāni upacinanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ licchavirājakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:1159_7: So vayappatto saddho pasanno dāyako dānarato kārako saṅghupaṭṭhāko hutvā tathārūpe aparādhe satthārā
atk-s0508a1:1159_8: pattanikkujjanakamme kārāpite aggiṃ akkanto viya saṅghaṃ khamāpetvā kammaṃ paṭippassambhetvā sañjātasaṃvego pabbaji,
atk-s0508a1:1159_10: Taṃ satthā saṃvejento “sattiyā viya omaṭṭho”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1160_1: Tattha bhavarāgappahānāyāti bhavarāgassa rūparāgassa arūparāgassa ca pajahanatthāya.
atk-s0508a1:1160_2: Yadipi ajjhattasaṃyojanāni appahāya bahiddhasaṃyojanānaṃ pahānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0508a1:1160_3: nānantarikabhāvato pana uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanappahānavacanena orambhāgiyasaṃyojanappahānampi vuttameva hoti.
atk-s0508a1:1160_4: Yasmā vā samucchinnorambhāgiyasaṃyojanānampi kesañci ariyānaṃ uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni duppaheyyāni honti,
atk-s0508a1:1160_5: tasmā suppaheyyato duppaheyyameva dassento bhagavā bhavarāgappahānasīsena sabbassāpi uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanassa pahānamāha.
atk-s0508a1:1165_2: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe
atk-s0508a1:1165_3: vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā kiṅkaṇipupphehi
atk-s0508a1:1165_4: pūjaṃ katvā tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1165_5: buddhuppāde rājagahe vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa gehe nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:1165_7: So vayappatto bimbisārasamāgame satthari saddhamme ca uppannappasādo hetusampannatāya pabbaji.
atk-s0508a1:1165_8: Pabbajitvā ca katapubbakicco vebhārapaṇḍavapabbatānaṃ avidūre aññatarasmiṃ araññāyatane pabbataguhāyaṃ kammaṭṭhānamanuyutto viharati.
atk-s0508a1:1165_11: Therassa ghammapariḷāhābhibhūtassa sāragabbhehi meghavātehi ghammapariḷāho vūpasami.
atk-s0508a1:1175_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā aññāpadesena attasannissayaṃ udānaṃ udānento “vivaramanupatanti vijjutā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1176_4: Vijjotanameva hi vijjullatānaṃ pavatti nāma. Anu-
atk-s0508a1:1176_8: Vebhārassa ca paṇḍavassa cāti vebhārapabbatassa ca paṇḍavapabbatassa ca vivaramanupatantīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a1:1176_12: Putto appaṭimassa tādinoti sīlakkhandhādidhammakāyasampattiyā rūpakāyasampattiyā ca anupamassa upamārahitassa
atk-s0508a1:1176_13: iṭṭhāniṭṭhādīsu tādilakkhaṇasampattiyā tādino buddhassa bhagavato orasaputto.
atk-s0508a1:1176_14: Puttavacaneneva cettha therena satthu anujātabhāvadīpanena aññā byākatāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1179_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare titthanāvikakule nibbattitvā mahāgaṅgāya payāgatitthe
atk-s0508a1:1179_3: titthanāvākammaṃ karonto ekadivasaṃ sasāvakasaṅghaṃ bhagavantaṃ gaṅgātīraṃ upagataṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:1179_4: nāvāsaṅghāṭaṃ yojetvā mahantena pūjāsakkārena paratīraṃ pāpetvā aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ satthārā āraññakānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1179_5: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapiyamānaṃ disvā tadatthaṃ patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahādānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1179_7: Bhagavā ca tassa patthanāya avajjhabhāvaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1179_8: So tato paṭṭhāya tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:1179_9: magadharaṭṭhe nālakagāme rūpasāriyā brāhmaṇiyā kucchismiṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:1179_10: Taṃ vayappattaṃ mātāpitaro gharabandhanena bandhitukāmā jātā.
atk-s0508a1:1179_11: So sāriputtattherassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā “mayhaṃ jeṭṭhabhātā ayyo upatisso imaṃ vibhavaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajito,
atk-s0508a1:1179_12: tena vantaṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ kathāhaṃ pacchā gilissāmī”ti jātasaṃvego pāsaṃ anupagacchanakamigo viya ñātake
atk-s0508a1:1179_13: vañcetvā hetusampattiyā codiyamāno bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā dhammasenāpatino kaniṭṭhabhāvaṃ nivedetvā
atk-s0508a1:1179_15: Bhikkhū taṃ pabbājetvā paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ upasampādetvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1179_17: “arahattaṃ patvā bhagavantaṃ dhammasenāpatiñca passissāmī”ti ghaṭento vāyamanto ñāṇassa paripākagatattā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:1181_0: Kutitthe nāviko āsiṃ, orime ca tariṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1187_0: Vārimajjhe ṭhito satthā, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a1:1197_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:1206_0: “Satasahasse kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha;
atk-s0508a1:1211_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā thero satthāraṃ dhammasenāpatiñca vandituṃ senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0508a1:1211_1: anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanaṃ pavisitvā satthāraṃ dhammasenāpatiñca vanditvā katipāhaṃ jetavane vihāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1211_2: Atha naṃ satthā ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno āraññakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi –
atk-s0508a1:1211_5: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āraññakānaṃ yadidaṃ revato khadiravaniyo”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1211_6: So aparabhāge attano jātagāmaṃ gantvā “cālā, upacālā,
atk-s0508a1:1211_8: sīsūpacālā”ti tayo bhāgineyye ānetvā pabbājetvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojesi.
atk-s0508a1:1211_10: Tasmiñca samaye therassa kocideva ābādho uppanno.
atk-s0508a1:1211_11: Taṃ sutvā sāriputtatthero revataṃ “gilānapucchanaṃ adhigamapucchanañca karissāmī”ti upagacchi.
atk-s0508a1:1211_12: Revatatthero dhammasenāpatiṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā tesaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ satuppādanavasena ovadanto “cāle upacāle”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1212_1: Tattha cāle upacāle sīsūpacāleti tesaṃ ālapanaṃ. “Cālā, upacālā,
atk-s0508a1:1212_2: sīsūpacālā”ti hi itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmā te tayo dārakā pabbajitāpi tathā voharīyanti. “‘Cālī, upacālī,
atk-s0508a1:1212_5: taṃ dassento “patissatā nu kho viharathā”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇamāha “āgato vo vālaṃ viya vedhī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1212_12: tikkhajavananibbedhikapaññatāya vālavedhirūpo satthukappo tumhākaṃ mātulatthero āgato,
atk-s0508a1:1212_13: tasmā samaṇasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā satisampajaññayuttā eva hutvā viharatha,
atk-s0508a1:1213_0: Taṃ sutvā te sāmaṇerā dhammasenāpatissa paccuggamanādivattaṃ katvā ubhinnaṃ mātulattherānaṃ paṭisanthāravelāyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1213_2: Dhammasenāpati revatattherena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā te sāmaṇere upasaṅkami,
atk-s0508a1:1213_3: te tathākālaparicchedassa katattā there upasaṅkamante eva uṭṭhahitvā vanditvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:1213_4: Thero “katarakataravihārena viharathā”ti pucchitvā tehi “imāya imāyā”ti vutte “dārakepi nāma evaṃ vinento
atk-s0508a1:1213_5: mayhaṃ bhātiko paccapādi vata dhammassa anudhamma”nti theraṃ pasaṃsanto pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:1216_2: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:1216_3: So ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ nhāyitvā ekacīvaraṃ ṭhitaṃ disvā somanassappatto hutvā apphoṭesi.
atk-s0508a1:1216_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyā avidūre aññatarasmiṃ gāmake
atk-s0508a1:1216_7: So vayappatto khujjakāsitanaṅgalakuddālaparikkhāro hutvā kasiyā jīvati.
atk-s0508a1:1216_8: So ekadivasaṃ raññā pasenadikosalena bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahādāne pavattiyamāne dānopakaraṇāni
atk-s0508a1:1216_9: gahetvā āgacchantehi manussehi saddhiṃ dadhighaṭaṃ gahetvā āgato bhikkhūnaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ disvā “ime
atk-s0508a1:1216_10: samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sukhumavatthasunivatthā subhojanāni bhuñjitvā nivātesu senāsanesu viharanti,
atk-s0508a1:1216_12: aññataraṃ mahātheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano pabbajjādhippāyaṃ nivedesi.
atk-s0508a1:1216_13: So taṃ karuṇāyanto pabbājetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0508a1:1216_14: So araññe viharanto ekavihāre nibbinno ukkaṇṭhito hutvā,
atk-s0508a1:1216_15: vibbhamitukāmo ñātigāmaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge kacchaṃ bandhitvā khettaṃ kasante kiliṭṭhavatthanivatthe
atk-s0508a1:1216_16: samantato rajokiṇṇasarīre vātātapena phussante kassake disvā,
atk-s0508a1:1216_17: “mahantaṃ vatime sattā jīvikanimittaṃ dukkhaṃ paccanubhontī”ti saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0508a1:1216_18: Ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā yathāgahitaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1216_19: So aññataraṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upagantvā vivekaṃ labhitvā yoniso manasikaronto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1222_0: Haṭṭho haṭṭhena cittena, apphoṭesiṃ ahaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:1226_0: Sabbe satte abhibhomi, vipulo hoti me yaso.
atk-s0508a1:1228_0: Attānaṃ tosayitvāna, pare tosesi tvaṃ muni.
atk-s0508a1:1234_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā sampattiṃ attano dukkhavimuttiñca kittanavasena udānaṃ udānento “sumuttiko”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a1:1235_1: Tattha sumuttikoti sundarā accantikatāya apunabbhavikā mutti etassāti sumuttiko.
atk-s0508a1:1235_2: Tassa pana vimuttiyā pāsaṃsiyatāya acchariyatāya ca apphoṭento āha “sumuttiko”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1235_3: Puna tattha vimuttiyaṃ attano pasādassa daḷhabhāvaṃ dassento “sāhu sumuttikomhī”ti āha.
atk-s0508a1:1235_7: attano pana tāva upaṭṭhitaṃ ativiya aniṭṭhabhūtaṃ dukkhaṃ dassento “tīhi khujjakehī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a1:1235_11: Kassako hi akhujjopi samāno tīsu ṭhānesu attānaṃ khujjaṃ katvā dasseti lāyane kasane kuddālakamme ca.
atk-s0508a1:1235_12: Yo hi pana kassako lāyanādīni karoti,
atk-s0508a1:1235_13: tānipi asitādīni kuṭilākārato khujjakānīti vuttaṃ “tīhi khujjakehī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1236_3: Tattha asitāsu mayāti lavittehi mayā muttanti attho.
atk-s0508a1:1236_6: Apare pana “asitāsu mayāti lavittehi karaṇabhūtehi mayā khujjita”nti vadanti.
atk-s0508a1:1236_7: Tesaṃ matena karaṇatthe hetumhi vā bhummavacanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1236_10: Attanā vaḷañjitakuddālassa sabhāvato vaḷañjanena vā appakatāya vuttaṃ “khuddakuddālāsū”ti “kuṇṭhakuddālāsū”tipi pāḷi.
atk-s0508a1:1236_16: Gāmake ṭhitattā tāni asitādīni kiñcāpi idheva mama samīpeyeva,
atk-s0508a1:1236_19: Jhāyāti phalasamāpattijjhānavasena diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ dibbavihārādivasena ca jhāya.
atk-s0508a1:1236_22: Appamatto viharāti satipaññāvepullappattiyā sabbatthakameva appamattosi tvaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1236_25: Keci pana “arahattaṃ appatvā eva vipassanāya vīthipaṭipannāya sāsane sañjātābhiratiyā yathānubhūtaṃ gharāvāsadukkhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1236_26: jigucchanto thero imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā pacchā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0508a1:1236_27: Tesaṃ matena “jhāya appamatto viharā”ti padānaṃ attho vipassanāmaggavasenapi yujjati eva.
atk-s0508a1:1239_0: Mataṃ vā amma rodantīti āyasmato sānuttherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:1239_2: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito catunavute
atk-s0508a1:1239_3: kappe siddhatthassa bhagavato hatthapādadhovanamukhavikkhālanānaṃ atthāya udakaṃ upanesi.
atk-s0508a1:1239_4: Satthā hi bhojanakāle hatthapāde dhovitukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:1239_5: So satthu ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā udakaṃ upanesi.
atk-s0508a1:1239_6: Bhagavā hatthapāde dhovitvā bhuñjitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:1239_9: Evaṃ bhagavā anukampaṃ upādāya tena karīyamānaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ sādiyi.
atk-s0508a1:1239_10: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:1239_11: sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa upāsakassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a1:1239_13: upāsikā dasamāsaccayena puttaṃ vijāyitvā sānūtissa nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1239_14: Tasmiṃ anukkamena vaḍḍhante sattavassikaṃyeva naṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike pabbājesi,
atk-s0508a1:1239_16: “So sānusāmaṇero”ti paññāto paññavā vattasampanno bahussuto dhammakathiko sattesu mettajjhāsayo hutvā
atk-s0508a1:1239_17: devamanussānaṃ piyo ahosi manāpoti sabbaṃ sānusutte āgatanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1240_1: Taṃ yakkhā “sānuttherassa ayaṃ mātā”ti garucittikārabahulā hutvā mānenti.
atk-s0508a1:1240_2: Evaṃ gacchante kāle puthujjanabhāvassa ādīnavaṃ vibhāventaṃ viya ekadivasaṃ sānussa yoniso manasikārābhāvā
atk-s0508a1:1240_4: Taṃ tassa yakkhinimātā ñatvā manussamātuyā ārocesi –
atk-s0508a1:1242_0: Mākāsi pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvi vā yadi vā raho.
atk-s0508a1:1243_0: “Sace tvaṃ pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, karissasi karosi vā;
atk-s0508a1:1244_0: Na te dukkhā pamutyatthi, uppaccāpi palāyato”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:1245_2: Manussamātā pana taṃ sutvā paridevasokasamāpannā cetodukkhasamappitā ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:1245_3: Atha sānusāmaṇero pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya mātu santikaṃ upagato mātaraṃ rodamānaṃ disvā “amma,
atk-s0508a1:1245_4: kiṃ nissāya rodasī”ti vatvā “taṃ nissāyā”ti ca vutto mātu “mataṃ vā, amma, rodanti,
atk-s0508a1:1245_5: yo vā jīvaṃ na dissatī”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1246_2: rodantā nāma ñātakā mittā vā attano ñātakaṃ mittaṃ vā mataṃ uddissa rodanti paralokaṃ gatattā,
atk-s0508a1:1246_3: yo vā ñātako mitto vā jīvaṃ jīvanto desantaraṃ pakkantatāya ca na dissati,
atk-s0508a1:1246_6: evaṃ sante jīvantaṃ dharamānaṃ maṃ purato ṭhitaṃ passantī; kasmā, amma,
atk-s0508a1:1246_7: rodasi?Maṃ uddissa tava rodanassa kāraṇameva natthī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1247_2: yo sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattatī”ti suttapadānusārena uppabbajanaṃ ariyassa vinaye maraṇanti dassentī –
atk-s0508a1:1248_0: “Mataṃ vā putta rodanti, yo vā jīvaṃ na dissati;
atk-s0508a1:1249_0: Yo ca kāme cajitvāna, punarāgacchate idha.
atk-s0508a1:1250_0: “Taṃ vāpi putta rodanti, puna jīvaṃ mato hi so;
atk-s0508a1:1253_0: Tattha kāme cajitvānāti nekkhammajjhāsayena vatthukāme pahāya,
atk-s0508a1:1253_3: Punarāgacchate idhāti idha gehe punadeva āgacchati,
atk-s0508a1:1253_6: taṃ vāpi puggalaṃ mataṃ viyamādisiyo rodanti.
atk-s0508a1:1253_8: Puna jīvaṃ mato hi soti vibbhamanato pacchā yo jīvanto,
atk-s0508a1:1253_12: “ahorattaṃ ādittaṃ viya hutvā ḍahanaṭṭhena kukkuḷanirayasadisattā kukkuḷā gihibhāvā anukampantiyā mayā ubbhato uddhato,
atk-s0508a1:1254_0: Taṃ sutvā sānusāmaṇero saṃvegajāto hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1264_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā thero imissā gāthāya vasena “mayhaṃ vipassanārambho arahattappatti ca jātā”ti udānavasena tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1267_0: Yathāpi bhaddo ājaññoti āyasmato ramaṇīyavihārittherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:1267_2: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha puññāni upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1267_3: disvā pasannamānaso pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā koraṇḍapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1267_4: So tena puññakammena devesu nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:1267_5: rājagahe aññatarassa seṭṭhissa putto hutvā nibbatto yobbanamadena kāmesu mucchaṃ āpanno viharati.
atk-s0508a1:1267_6: So ekadivasaṃ aññataraṃ pāradārikaṃ rājapurisehi vividhā kammakāraṇā karīyamānaṃ disvā saṃvegajāto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā pabbaji.
atk-s0508a1:1267_7: Pabbajito ca rāgacaritatāya niccakālaṃ susammaṭṭhaṃ pariveṇaṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ pānīyaparibhojanīyaṃ supaññataṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ katvā viharati.
atk-s0508a1:1268_0: So rāgussannatāya ayoniso manasi karitvā sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiāpattiṃ āpajjitvā,
atk-s0508a1:1268_2: maṃ evaṃbhūto saddhādeyyaṃ bhuñjeyya”nti vippaṭisārī hutvā “vibbhamissāmī”ti gacchanto antarāmagge rukkhamūle nisīdi,
