atk-s0508a1:1268_3: tena ca maggena sakaṭesu gacchantesu eko sakaṭayutto goṇo parissamanto visamaṭṭhāne khalitvā pati,
atk-s0508a1:1268_4: taṃ sākaṭikā yugato muñcitvā tiṇodakaṃ datvā parissamaṃ vinodetvā punapi dhure yojetvā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:1268_6: “yathāyaṃ goṇo sakiṃ khalitvāpi uṭṭhāya sakiṃ dhuraṃ vahati,
atk-s0508a1:1268_7: evaṃ mayāpi kilesavasena sakiṃ khalitenāpi vuṭṭhāya samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti yoniso ummujjanto
atk-s0508a1:1268_8: nivattitvā upālittherassa attano pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā tena vuttavidhinā āpattito vuṭṭhahitvā sīlaṃ pākatikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1268_9: katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1278_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhaṃ anubhavanto attano pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyā saddhiṃ ariyadhammādhigamanadīpaniṃ “yathāpi bhaddo ājañño,
atk-s0508a1:1279_4: Evanti yathā bhaddo usabhājānīyo bhāraṃ vahanto parissamappatto visamaṭṭhānaṃ āgamma ekavāraṃ pakkhalitvā patito na tattakena dhuraṃ chaḍḍeti,
atk-s0508a1:1279_7: evaṃ kilesaparissamappatto kiriyāparādhena khalitvā taṃ khalitaṃ thāmavīriyasampattitāya paṭipākatikaṃ katvā maggasammādiṭṭhiyā dassanasampannaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1279_8: tato eva sammāsambuddhassa savanante ariyāya jātiyā jātatāya sāvakaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1279_9: tassa ure vāyāmajanitābhijātitāya orasaṃ puttaṃ bhaddājānīyasadisakiccatāya ājānīyanti ca maṃ dhāretha upadhārethāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:1282_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu kattādhikāro tattha tattha puññāni upacinanto ito catunavute kappe siddhatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1282_3: bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso savaṇṭāni pupphāni kaṇṇikabaddhāni gahetvā pūjesi.
atk-s0508a1:1282_4: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva parivattento imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe kulagehe nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:1282_5: Tassa jātakālato paṭṭhāya taṃ kulaṃ dhanadhaññādīhi vaḍḍhi,
atk-s0508a1:1282_6: attabhāvo cassa abhirūpo dassanīyo guṇavā iti vibhavasamiddhiyā ca guṇasamiddhiyā ca samiddhītveva paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a1:1282_7: So bimbisārasamāgame buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā bhāvanāya yuttappayutto viharanto
atk-s0508a1:1282_8: bhagavati tapodārāme viharante ekadivasaṃ evaṃ cintesi –
atk-s0508a1:1282_13: Taṃ asahanto māro pāpimā therassa avidūre mahantaṃ bheravasaddamakāsi,
atk-s0508a1:1282_18: Thero tattha gantvā viharanto nacirasseva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1292_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā tattheva viharantassa therassa khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ ajānanto purimanayeneva māro mahantaṃ bheravasaddaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1292_1: Taṃ sutvā thero abhīto acchambhī “tādisānaṃ mārānaṃ satampi sahassampi mayhaṃ lomampi na kampetī”ti aññaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1293_1: Tattha saddhāyāti dhammacchandasamuṭṭhānāya kammaphalasaddhāya ceva ratanattayasaddhāya ca.
atk-s0508a1:1293_6: sā hi yaṃkiñci kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ ‘agārassa hita’nti agāriyaṃ nāma,
atk-s0508a1:1293_8: Sati paññā ca me vuḍḍhāti saraṇalakkhaṇā sati,
atk-s0508a1:1293_9: pajānanalakkhaṇā paññāti ime dhammā vipassanākkhaṇato paṭṭhāya maggapaṭipāṭiyā yāva arahattā me vuḍḍhā vaḍḍhitā,
atk-s0508a1:1293_10: na dāni vaḍḍhetabbā atthi satipaññā vepullappattāti dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:1293_11: Cittañca susamāhitanti aṭṭhasamāpattivasena ceva lokuttarasamādhivasena ca cittaṃ me suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1293_14: Tasmā kāmaṃ karassu rūpānīti pāpima maṃ uddissa yāni kānici vippakārāni yathāruciṃ karohi,
atk-s0508a1:1293_15: tehi pana neva maṃ byādhayissasi mama sarīrakampanamattampi kātuṃ na sakkhissasi,
atk-s0508a1:1293_17: Tasmā tava kiriyā appaṭicchitapahenakaṃ viya na kiñci atthaṃ sodheti,
atk-s0508a1:1293_18: kevalaṃ tava cittavighātamattaphalāti thero māraṃ tajjesi.
atk-s0508a1:1293_19: Taṃ sutvā māro “jānāti maṃ samaṇo”ti tatthevantaradhāyi.
atk-s0508a1:1296_0: Namo te buddha vīratthūti āyasmato ujjayattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:1296_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto ito dvānavute kappe tissaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1296_4: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:1296_5: rājagahe aññatarassa sottiyabrāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:1296_7: So vayappatto tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū hutvā tattha sāraṃ apassanto upanissayasampattiyā codiyamāno veḷuvanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1296_8: gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe
atk-s0508a1:1296_9: viharanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1304_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā bhagavato thomanākārena aññaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1304_1: byākaronto “namo te buddha vīratthū”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1305_5: Bhagavā hi yathā abhiññeyyādibhedassa atthassa abhiññeyyādibhedena sayambhūñāṇena anavasesato buddhattā “buddho”ti vuccati.
atk-s0508a1:1305_6: Evaṃ pañcannampi mārānaṃ abhippamaddanavasena padahantena mahatā vīriyena samannāgatattā “vīro”ti vuccati.
atk-s0508a1:1305_9: Vippamuttosi sabbadhīti sabbehi kilesehi sabbasmiñca saṅkhāragate vippamutto visaṃyutto asi bhavasi,
atk-s0508a1:1305_10: na tayā kiñci avippamuttaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0508a1:1305_12: viharāmi anāsavoti tuyhaṃ tava apadāne ovāde gatamagge paṭipatticariyāya viharaṃ yathāsatti yathābalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1305_13: paṭipajjanto kāmāsavādīnaṃ catunnampi āsavānaṃ suppahīnattā anāsavo viharāmi,
atk-s0508a1:1308_2: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:1308_3: kāle mahati pūge saṃkittivasena vatthuṃ saṅgharitvā ratanattayaṃ uddissa puññaṃ karonto sayaṃ daliddo
atk-s0508a1:1308_4: hutvā nesaṃ gaṇādīnaṃ puññakiriyāya byāvaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:1308_5: Kālena kālaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā pasannamānaso bhikkhūnañca taṃ taṃ veyyāvaccaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1308_6: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:1308_7: rājagahe vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti sañjayo nāma nāmena,
atk-s0508a1:1308_8: so vayappatto brahmāyupokkharasātiādike abhiññāte brāhmaṇe sāsane abhippasanne disvā sañjātappasādo satthāraṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0508a1:1315_0: “Ito ca aṭṭhame kappe, rājā āsiṃ sucintito;
atk-s0508a1:1318_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā aññaṃ byākaronto “yato ahaṃ pabbajito”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1319_1: Tattha yato ahaṃ pabbajitoti yato pabhuti yato paṭṭhāya ahaṃ pabbajito.
atk-s0508a1:1319_3: anariyaṃ dosasaṃhitanti rāgādidosasaṃhitaṃ tato eva anariyaṃ nihīnaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1319_4: ariyehi vā anaraṇīyatāya anariyehi araṇīyatāya ca anariyaṃ pāpakaṃ ārammaṇe abhūtaguṇādisaṅkappanato
atk-s0508a1:1322_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:1322_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1322_4: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsu eva parivattento imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:1322_5: sāvatthiyaṃ ibbhakule nibbattitvā vayappatto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe sañjātappasādo pabbajitvā cariyānukūlaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1322_7: Tassa attano sampattiyā pabbajitasāruppāya ca paṭipattiyā pāsādikabhāvato rāmaṇeyyakotveva samaññā ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:1322_8: Athekadivasaṃ māro theraṃ bhiṃsāpetukāmo bheravasaddaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1322_9: Taṃ sutvā thero thirapakatitāya tena asantasanto “māro aya”nti ñatvā tattha anādaraṃ dassento “cihacihābhinadite”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1323_1: Tattha cihacihābhinaditeti cihacihāti abhiṇhaṃ pavattasaddatāya “cihacihā”ti laddhanāmānaṃ vaṭṭakānaṃ abhinādanimittaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1323_3: Sippikābhirutehi cāti sippikā vuccanti devakā paranāmakā gelaññena chātakisadārakākārā sākhāmigā.
atk-s0508a1:1323_8: Na me taṃ phandati cittanti mama cittaṃ na phandati na cavati.
atk-s0508a1:1323_10: imasmiṃ araññe viravahetu sippikābhirutahetu viya, pāpima,
atk-s0508a1:1323_11: tava vissarakaraṇahetu mama cittaṃ kammaṭṭhānato na paripatatīti.
atk-s0508a1:1323_14: yasmā mama cittaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya ekatte ekībhāve,
atk-s0508a1:1323_15: bahiddhā vā vikkhepaṃ pahāya ekatte ekaggatāya,
atk-s0508a1:1323_16: ekatte ekasabhāve vā nibbāne nirataṃ abhirataṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1323_17: tasmā kammaṭṭhānato na phandati na cavatīti,
atk-s0508a1:1323_18: imaṃ kira gāthaṃ vadanto eva thero vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1336_0: Dharaṇī ca siñcati vāti āyasmato vimalattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:1336_2: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:1336_3: kāle saṅkhadhamanakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto tasmiṃ sippe nipphattiṃ gato ekadivasaṃ vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1336_4: passitvā pasannamānaso saṅkhadhamanena pūjaṃ katvā tato paṭṭhāya kālena kālaṃ satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1336_5: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa
atk-s0508a1:1336_6: bhagavato kāle “anāgate me vimalo visuddho kāyo hotū”ti bodhirukkhaṃ gandhodakehi nhāpesi,
atk-s0508a1:1337_0: So tato cavitvā devesu ca manussesu ca parivattento imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe ibbhakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:1337_1: Tassa mātukucchiyaṃ vasantassa nikkhamantassa ca kāyo pittasemhādīhi asaṃkiliṭṭho padumapalāse udakabindu
atk-s0508a1:1337_2: viya alaggo pacchimabhavikabodhisattassa viya suvisuddho ahosi,
atk-s0508a1:1337_4: So vayappatto rājagahappavesane buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā kosalaraṭṭhe pabbataguhāyaṃ viharati.
atk-s0508a1:1337_5: Athekadivasaṃ cātuddīpikamahāmegho sakalaṃ cakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pattharitvā pāvassi.
atk-s0508a1:1337_6: Vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyimhi buddhānaṃ cakkavattīnañca dharamānakāle eva kira evaṃ vassati.
atk-s0508a1:1337_7: Ghammapariḷāhavūpasamato utusappāyalābhena therassa cittaṃ samāhitaṃ ahosi ekaggaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1337_8: So samāhitacitto tāvadeva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1347_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā katakiccatāya tuṭṭhamānaso udānaṃ udānento “dharaṇī ca siñcati vāti māluto”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1348_2: sā hi sakalaṃ dharādharaṃ dhāretīti “dharaṇī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0508a1:1348_3: Siñcatīti samantato nabhaṃ pūretvā abhippavassato mahāmeghassa vuṭṭhidhārāhi siñcati.
atk-s0508a1:1348_4: Vāti mālutoti udakaphusitasammissatāya sītalo vāto vāyati.
atk-s0508a1:1348_5: Vijjutā carati nabheti tattha tattha gajjatā gaḷagaḷāyatā mahāmeghato niccharantiyo sateratā ākāse ito cito ca vicaranti.
atk-s0508a1:1348_6: Upasamanti vitakkāti utusappāyasiddhena samathavipassanādhigamena pubbabhāge tadaṅgādivasena vūpasantā
atk-s0508a1:1348_7: hutvā kāmavitakkādayo sabbepi nava mahāvitakkā ariyamaggādhigamena upasamanti.
atk-s0508a1:1348_11: Cittaṃ susamāhitaṃ mamāti tato eva lokuttarasamādhinā mama cittaṃ suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1348_12: na dāni tassa samādhāne kiñci kātabbaṃ atthīti thero aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1353_0: Vassati devotiādikā catasso – godhiko, subāhu, valliyo,
atk-s0508a1:1353_3: Imepi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinantā ito catunavute kappe siddhatthassa
atk-s0508a1:1353_4: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā aññamaññaṃ sahāyā hutvā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:1353_5: Tesu eko siddhatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1353_6: Dutiyo pasannacitto hutvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā añjaliṃ paggaṇhi.
atk-s0508a1:1353_7: Tatiyo pasannacitto ekena pupphahatthena bhagavantaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0508a1:1353_9: Evaṃ te satthari cittaṃ pasādetvā pasutena tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā puna aparāparaṃ puññāni
atk-s0508a1:1353_10: katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā sahāyakā hutvā sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:1353_11: samaṇadhammaṃ katvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle pāvāyaṃ catunnaṃ mallarājānaṃ puttā hutvā nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:1353_16: Tasmiñca samaye satthā kapilavatthuṃ gantvā nigrodhārāme vasanto yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā suddhodanappamukhe sakyarājāno damesi.
atk-s0508a1:1353_17: Tadā tepi cattāro mallarājaputtā pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā laddhappasādā pabbajitvā vipassanākammaṃ karontā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:1359_0: Uḷārā vitti me jātā, buddhe ādiccabandhune.
atk-s0508a1:1400_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā ime cattāropi therā loke pākaṭā paññātā rājarājamahāmattehi sakkatā garukatā hutvā araññe saheva viharanti.
atk-s0508a1:1400_1: Athekadā rājā bimbisāro te cattāro there rājagahaṃ upagate upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā temāsaṃ vassāvāsatthāya
atk-s0508a1:1400_2: nimantetvā tesaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ kuṭikāyo kāretvā satisammosena na chādesi.
atk-s0508a1:1400_5: Rājā “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇaṃ devo na vassatī”ti cintento,
atk-s0508a1:1400_9: kuṭikāmahaṃ karonto mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1400_10: Therā rañño anukampāya kuṭikāyo pavisitvā mettāsamāpattiyo samāpajjiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:1400_11: Athuttarapācīnadisato mahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā therānaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhānakkhaṇeyeva vassituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0508a1:1400_12: Tesu godhikatthero samāpattito vuṭṭhāya saha meghagajjitena –
atk-s0508a1:1402_0: “Vassati devo yathā sugītaṃ, channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā;
atk-s0508a1:1403_0: Cittaṃ susamāhitañca mayhaṃ, atha ce patthayasi pavassa devā”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:1405_2: Yathā sugītanti sundaragītaṃ viya gajjantoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:1405_3: Megho hi vassanakāle satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo uṭṭhahitvā thanayanto vijjutā nicchārentova sobhati,
atk-s0508a1:1405_6: Tena saddato anupapīḷitaṃ āha “channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1405_8: evaṃ tiṇādīhi chāditā ayaṃ me kuṭikā,
atk-s0508a1:1405_13: Cittaṃ susamāhitañca mayhanti cittañca mama suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ anuttarasamādhinā nibbānārammaṇe suṭṭhu appitaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1405_15: Atha ce patthayasīti atha idāni patthayasi ce,
atk-s0508a1:1405_17: Pavassāti siñca udakaṃ pagghara vuṭṭhidhāraṃ paveccha.
atk-s0508a1:1408_2: Tattha subāhunā vuttagāthāyaṃ cittaṃ susamāhitañca kāyeti mama cittaṃ karajakāye kāyagatāsatibhāvanāvasena suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ sammadeva appitaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1408_3: Ayañhi thero kāyagatāsatibhāvanāvasena paṭiladdhajhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1411_1: Valliyattheragāthāyaṃ tassaṃ viharāmi appamattoti tassaṃ kuṭikāyaṃ appamādapaṭipattiyā matthakaṃ pāpitattā
atk-s0508a1:1411_2: appamatto ariyavihārūpasaṃhitena dibbavihārādisaṃhitena ca iriyāpathavihārena viharāmi,
atk-s0508a1:1418_0: Āsandiṃ kuṭikaṃ katvāti āyasmato añjanavaniyattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:1418_2: So kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle sudassano nāma mālākāro hutvā sumanapupphehi bhagavantaṃ pūjetvā
atk-s0508a1:1418_3: aññampi tattha tattha bahuṃ puññaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:1418_5: Atha imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ vajjirājakule nibbattitvā tassa vayappattakāle vajjiraṭṭhe avuṭṭhibhayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1418_8: Bhagavati pana vesāliṃ paviṭṭhe bhayesu ca vūpasantesu satthu dhammadesanāya sambahulānaṃ devamanussānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1418_9: dhammābhisamaye ca jāte ayaṃ rājakumāro buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji.
atk-s0508a1:1418_10: Yathā cāyaṃ evaṃ anantaraṃ vuccamānā cattāropi janā.
atk-s0508a1:1418_11: Tepi hi imassa sahāyabhūtā licchavirājakumārā evaṃ imināva nīhārena pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:1418_12: Kassapasambuddhakālepi sahāyā hutvā iminā saheva pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0508a1:1418_14: Tatthāyaṃ katapubbakicco sākete añjanavane susānaṭṭhāne vasanto upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya manussehi
atk-s0508a1:1418_15: chaḍḍitaṃ jiṇṇakaṃ āsandiṃ labhitvā taṃ catūsu pāsāṇesu ṭhapetvā upari tiriyañca tiṇādīhi chādetvā dvāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:1428_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento samāpattito vuṭṭhāya yathāladdhaṃ sampattiṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0508a1:1428_1: pītivegena udānento “āsandiṃ kuṭikaṃ katvā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1429_1: Tattha āsandiṃ kuṭikaṃ katvāti āsandī nāma dīghapādakaṃ caturassapīṭhaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1429_4: na nipajjituṃ taṃ āsandiṃ kuṭikaṃ katvā vāsatthāya heṭṭhā vuttanayena kuṭikaṃ katvā yathā tattha nisinnassa
atk-s0508a1:1429_7: Etena paramukkaṃsagataṃ senāsane attano appicchataṃ santuṭṭhiñca dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:1432_0: Apare “āsandikuṭika”nti pāṭhaṃ vatvā “āsandippamāṇaṃ kuṭikaṃ katvā”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0508a1:1432_1: Aññe pana “āsananisajjādigate manusse uddissa mañcakassa upari katakuṭikā āsandī nāma,
atk-s0508a1:1432_2: taṃ āsandiṃ kuṭikaṃ katvā”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0508a1:1432_8: taṃ añjanavanaṃ oggayha āsandikaṃ kuṭikaṃ katvā tisso vijjā anuppattā,
atk-s0508a1:1432_9: kataṃ buddhassa sāsananti viharatā mayāti vacanaseseneva yojanā.
atk-s0508a1:1435_2: So kira padumuttarassa bhagavato ākāsena gacchantassa “udakadānaṃ dassāmī”ti sītalaṃ udakaṃ gahetvā pītisomanassajāto uddhammukho hutvā ukkhipi.
atk-s0508a1:1435_3: Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā pasādasaṃvaḍḍhanatthaṃ ākāse ṭhitova sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0508a1:1435_7: ayaṃ kira vuttanayena pabbajitvā katapubbakicco vipassanaṃ anuyuñjanto sāyaṃ khettasamīpena gacchanto
atk-s0508a1:1435_8: deve phusāyante khettapālakassa puññaṃ tiṇakuṭiṃ disvā pavisitvā tattha tiṇasanthārake nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:1435_9: Nisinnamattova utusappāyaṃ labhitvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1449_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā there tattha nisinne khettapālako āgantvā “ko kuṭikāya”nti āha.
atk-s0508a1:1449_2: Tayidaṃ khettapālassa therassa ca vacanaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā –
atk-s0508a1:1452_0: Evaṃ jānāhi āvuso, amoghā te kuṭikā katā”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:1454_3: Atha naṃ attano anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvato taṃ kuṭiparibhogaṃ anumodāpetvā uḷāraṃ tameva puññaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ “vītarāgo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1454_5: eko bhinnakileso bhikkhu te kuṭikāyaṃ nisinno,
atk-s0508a1:1454_6: tato eva so aggamaggena sabbaso samucchinnarāgatāya vītarāgo anuttarasamādhinā nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā suṭṭhu samāhitacittatāya susamāhitacitto,
atk-s0508a1:1454_11: Amoghā te kuṭikā katā tayā katā kuṭikā amoghā avañjhā saphalā saudrayā,
atk-s0508a1:1454_14: taṃ te bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyāti.
atk-s0508a1:1455_2: yassa me kuṭikāyaṃ ediso ayyo pavisitvā nisīdatī”ti pasannacitto anumodanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1455_3: Imaṃ pana tesaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā sutvā anumodanañcassa ñatvā tambhāviniṃ sampattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1461_0: Kuṭikāyaṃ laddhavisesattā pana therassa tato pabhuti kuṭivihārītveva samaññā udapādi.
atk-s0508a1:1464_2: So kira padumuttarassa bhagavato pasannamānaso pariḷāhakāle naḷavilīvehi viracitaṃ bījaniṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1464_7: ayaṃ kira vuttanayena pabbajitvā aññatarāya purāṇakuṭikāya viharanto samaṇadhammaṃ acintetvā,
atk-s0508a1:1464_9: aññaṃ kuṭikaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti navakammavasena cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0508a1:1464_10: Tassa atthakāmā devatā saṃvegajananatthaṃ imaṃ uttānobhāsaṃ gambhīratthaṃ “ayamāhu”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:1465_5: Aññaṃ patthayase navaṃ kuṭinti imissā kuṭiyā purāṇabhāvena jiṇṇatāya ito aññaṃ idāni nibbattanīyatāya navaṃ kuṭiṃ patthayase patthesi āsīsasi.
atk-s0508a1:1465_6: Sabbena sabbaṃ pana āsaṃ kuṭiyā virājaya purāṇiyaṃ viya navāyampi kuṭiyaṃ āsaṃ taṇhaṃ apekkhaṃ virājehi,
atk-s0508a1:1465_8: Yasmā dukkhā bhikkhu puna navā nāma kuṭi bhikkhu puna idāni nibbattiyamānā dukkhāvahattā dukkhā,
atk-s0508a1:1465_9: tasmā aññaṃ navaṃ dukkhaṃ anuppādento yathānibbattāyaṃ purāṇiyaṃyeva kuṭiyaṃ ṭhatvā attanā katabbaṃ karohīti.
atk-s0508a1:1465_11: “ayaṃ purāṇī tiṇakuṭikā jiṇṇā”ti aññaṃ navaṃ tiṇakuṭikaṃ kātuṃ icchasi,
atk-s0508a1:1465_13: evaṃ icchanto pana bhāvanāya ananuyuñjanena punabbhavābhinibbattiyā anativattanato āyatiṃ attabhāvakuṭimpi patthento kātuṃ icchantoyeva nāma hoti.
atk-s0508a1:1465_14: Sā pana navā tiṇakuṭi viya karaṇadukkhena tato bhiyyopi jarāmaraṇasokaparidevādidukkhasaṃsaṭṭhatāya dukkhā,
atk-s0508a1:1465_15: tasmā tiṇakuṭiyaṃ viya attabhāvakuṭiyaṃ āsaṃ apekkhaṃ virājaya sabbaso tattha virattacitto hohi,
atk-s0508a1:1465_17: Devatāya ca vacanaṃ sutvā thero saṃvegajāto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1472_0: “Yathā me kāyo nibbāti, pariḷāho na vijjati;
atk-s0508a1:1487_0: Arahatte pana patiṭṭhito “ayaṃ me arahattappattiyā aṅkusabhūtā”ti tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1487_2: Kuṭiovādena laddhavisesattā cassa kuṭivihārītveva samaññā ahosīti.
atk-s0508a1:1490_0: Ramaṇīyā me kuṭikāti āyasmato ramaṇīyakuṭikattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:1490_2: Sopi kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kusalabījaropanaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito aṭṭhārasakappasatamatthake
atk-s0508a1:1490_3: atthadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto buddhārahaṃ āsanaṃ bhagavato adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1490_4: Pupphehi ca bhagavantaṃ pūjetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:1490_7: ayaṃ kira vuttanayena pabbajitvā katapubbakicco vajjiraṭṭhe aññatarasmiṃ gāmakāvāse kuṭikāyaṃ viharati,
atk-s0508a1:1490_8: sā hoti kuṭikā abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā suparikammakatabhittibhūmikā ārāmapokkharaṇirāmaṇeyyādisampannā
atk-s0508a1:1490_9: muttājālasadisavālikākiṇṇabhūmibhāgā therassa ca vattasampannatāya susammaṭṭhaṅgaṇatādinā bhiyyosomattāya
atk-s0508a1:1490_11: So tattha viharanto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1502_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā there tattha viharante kuṭikāya ramaṇīyabhāvato vihārapekkhakā manussā tato tato āgantvā kuṭiṃ passanti.
atk-s0508a1:1502_1: Athekadivasaṃ katipayā dhuttajātikā itthiyo tattha gatā kuṭikāya ramaṇīyabhāvaṃ disvā,
atk-s0508a1:1502_2: “ettha vasanto ayaṃ samaṇo siyā amhehi ākaḍḍhanīyahadayo”ti adhippāyena –
atk-s0508a1:1502_5: Mayampi ramaṇīyarūpā paṭhamayobbane ṭhitā”ti vatvā itthikuttādīni dassetuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:1502_6: Thero attano vītarāgabhāvaṃ pakāsento “ramaṇīyā me kuṭikā,
atk-s0508a1:1503_1: Tattha ramaṇīyā me kuṭikāti “ramaṇīyā te, bhante,
atk-s0508a1:1503_6: “evarūpāya manāpaṃ katvā pabbajitānaṃ dinnāya idaṃ nāma phalaṃ hotī”ti kammaphalāni saddahitvā saddhāya dhammacchandena dātabbattā saddhādeyyā,
atk-s0508a1:1503_8: Sayañca tathādinnāni saddhādeyyāni passantānaṃ paribhuñjantānañca mano rametīti manoramā.
atk-s0508a1:1503_11: saddhādeyyañca paribhuñjantā sappurisā dāyakassa avisaṃvādanatthampi payogāsayasampannā honti,
atk-s0508a1:1503_13: Na me attho kumārīhīti yasmā sabbaso kāmehi vinivattitamānaso ahaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1503_15: Kappiyakārakakammavasenapi hi mādisānaṃ itthīhi payojanaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0508a1:1503_19: Mādisassa nāma santike evaṃ paṭipajjāhīti ayuttakārinīhi yāva aparaddhañca tumhehi samānajjhāsayānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1503_20: purato ayaṃ kiriyā sobheyyāti dassento āha “yesaṃ attho tahiṃ gacchatha nāriyo”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1503_25: Taṃ sutvā itthiyo maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā āgatamaggeneva gatā.
atk-s0508a1:1503_26: Ettha ca “na me attho kumārīhī”ti kāmehi anatthikabhāvavacaneneva therena arahattaṃ byākatanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1506_2: Ayampi kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kusalabījaṃ ropetvā taṃ taṃ puññaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1506_5: ayaṃ kira vuttanayena pabbajitvā katapubbakicco kosalaraṭṭhe aññatarasmiṃ gāme ekaṃ upāsakakulaṃ nissāya araññe viharati,
atk-s0508a1:1506_6: taṃ so upāsako rukkhamūle vasantaṃ disvā kuṭikaṃ kāretvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1506_7: Thero kuṭikāyaṃ viharanto āvāsasappāyena samādhānaṃ labhitvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1517_0: “Sakaṃ cittaṃ pasādetvā, biḷāliṃ me adā tuvaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:1524_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhappaṭisaṃvedanena uppannapītivegena udānento “saddhāyāhaṃ pabbajito”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1525_1: Tattha saddhāyāti bhagavato vesāliṃ upagamane ānubhāvaṃ disvā,
atk-s0508a1:1525_3: tasmā addhā imāya paṭipattiyā jarāmaraṇato muccissāmī”ti uppannasaddhāvasena pabbajito pabbajjaṃ upagato.
atk-s0508a1:1525_4: Araññe me kuṭikā katāti tassā pabbajjāya anurūpavasena araññe vasato me kuṭikā katā,
atk-s0508a1:1525_5: pabbajjānurūpaṃ āraññako hutvā vūpakaṭṭho viharāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:1525_8: Araññavāsaladdhena kāyavivekena jāgariyaṃ anuyuñjanto tattha satiyā avippavāsena appamatto,
atk-s0508a1:1525_10: pubbabhāgiyasatisampajaññapāripūriyā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattādhigamena paññāsativepullappattiyā accantameva sampajāno patissato viharāmīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:1525_11: Appamattabhāvādikittane cassa idameva aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosi kosalaraṭṭhe ciranivāsibhāvena pana kosalavihārīti samaññā jātāti.
atk-s0508a1:1528_0: Te me ijjhiṃsu saṅkappāti āyasmato sīvalittherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:1528_2: Ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle heṭṭhā vuttanayena vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1528_3: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ lābhīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate evarūpena bhavituṃ
atk-s0508a1:1528_4: vaṭṭatī”ti dasabalaṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahādānaṃ datvā “bhagavā ahaṃ iminā
atk-s0508a1:1528_6: anāgate pana ekabuddhassa sāsane ahampi tumhehi so etadagge ṭhapitabhikkhu viya lābhīnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1528_8: “ayaṃ te patthanā anāgate gotamabuddhassa santike samijjhissatī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:1528_9: Sopi kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto vipassībuddhakāle bandhumatīnagarato avidūre ekasmiṃ gāmake paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a1:1528_10: Tasmiṃ samaye bandhumatīnagaravāsino raññā saddhiṃ sākacchitvā dasabalassa dānaṃ denti.
atk-s0508a1:1528_11: Te ekadivasaṃ sabbeva ekato hutvā dānaṃ dentā “kiṃ nu kho amhākaṃ dānamukhe natthī”ti madhuñca guḷadadhiñca na addasaṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:1528_12: Te “yato kutoci āharissāmā”ti janapadato nagarapavisanamagge purisaṃ ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1528_13: Tadā esa kulaputto attano gāmato guḷadadhivārakaṃ gahetvā,
atk-s0508a1:1528_15: “mukhaṃ dhovitvā dhotahatthapādo pavisissāmī”ti phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ olokento naṅgalasīsamattaṃ nimmakkhikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1528_16: daṇḍakamadhuṃ disvā “puññena me idaṃ uppanna”nti gahetvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0508a1:1528_21: vikkiṇituṃ pana me idaṃ ābhata”nti. “Tena hi, bho,
atk-s0508a1:1528_22: idaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ gahetvā etaṃ madhuñca guḷadadhiñca dehī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1528_27: Tato naṃ “nāhaṃ ekena kahāpaṇena demī”ti āha.
atk-s0508a1:1529_7: nagaravāsino raññā saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhitvā vipassīdasabalassa dānaṃ dentā idaṃ dvayaṃ dānamukhe apassantā pariyesanti,
atk-s0508a1:1529_14: “Atthi pana koci nāgarānaṃ dāne ekadivasaṃ sahassaṃ dātā”ti? “Natthi, sammā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1529_18: nāgarānaṃ ācikkha ‘eko puriso imāni dve mūlena na deti sahattheneva dātukāmo,
atk-s0508a1:1529_19: tumhe imesaṃ dvinnaṃ kāraṇā nibbitakkā hothā’ti,
atk-s0508a1:1529_20: tvaṃ pana me imasmiṃ dānamukhe jeṭṭhakabhāvassa kāyasakkhī hohī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1529_21: So paribbayatthaṃ gahitamāsakena pañcakaṭukaṃ gahetvā cuṇṇaṃ katvā dadhito kañjiyaṃ gahetvā tattha madhupaṭalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1529_22: pīḷetvā pañcakaṭukacuṇṇena yojetvā ekasmiṃ paduminipatte pakkhipitvā taṃ saṃvidahitvā ādāya dasabalassa
atk-s0508a1:1529_23: avidūraṭṭhāne nisīdi mahājanena āhariyamānassa sakkārassa avidūre attano pattavāraṃ olokayamāno,
atk-s0508a1:1529_24: so okāsaṃ ñatvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā bhagavā ayaṃ uppannaduggatapaṇṇākāro,
atk-s0508a1:1529_26: Satthā tassa anukampaṃ paṭicca catumahārājadattiyena selamayapattena taṃ paṭiggahetvā yathā aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā
atk-s0508a1:1529_29: So kulaputto niṭṭhitabhattakiccaṃ bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito āha –
atk-s0508a1:1529_32: ahampi imassa kammassa nissandena nibbattanibbattabhave lābhaggayasaggappatto bhaveyya”nti. Satthā,
atk-s0508a1:1529_34: kulaputtā”ti vatvā tassa ca nagaravāsīnañca bhattānumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:1530_0: Sopi kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde suppavāsāya rājadhītāya kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a1:1530_1: Paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya sāyaṃ pātañca paṇṇākārasatāni sakaṭenādāya suppavāsāya upanīyanti.
atk-s0508a1:1530_2: Atha naṃ puññavīmaṃsanatthaṃ hatthena bījapacchiṃ phusāpenti.
atk-s0508a1:1530_6: Rājadhītāya puññena gaṇhantānaṃ gahitagahitaṭṭhānaṃ puna pūrati.
atk-s0508a1:1530_7: Paripuṇṇabhattabhājanatopi “rājadhītāya puñña”nti vatvā yassa kassaci dentānaṃ yāva na ukkaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0508a1:1531_0: Gabbhe pana paripakke sattāhaṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhosi.
atk-s0508a1:1531_2: “pure maraṇā jīvamānāva dānaṃ dassāmī”ti satthu santikaṃ pesesi – “gaccha,
atk-s0508a1:1531_3: imaṃ pavattiṃ satthu ārocetvā satthāraṃ nimantehi,
atk-s0508a1:1531_5: taṃ sādhukaṃ upalakkhetvā āgantvā mayhaṃ kathehī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1531_6: So gantvā tassā sāsanaṃ bhagavato ārocesi. Satthā,
atk-s0508a1:1531_9: Rājā taṃ sutvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā attano gāmābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1531_10: Tassa pure āgamanāyeva suppavāsāya kucchito dhamakaraṇā udakaṃ viya gabbho nikkhami,
atk-s0508a1:1531_11: parivāretvā nisinnajano assumukhova hasituṃ āraddho tuṭṭhapahaṭṭho mahājano rañño sāsanaṃ ārocetuṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1532_2: So āgantvā satthu sāsanaṃ rājadhītāya ārocesi.
atk-s0508a1:1532_3: Rājadhītā tayā nimantitaṃ jīvitabhattameva maṅgalabhattaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0508a1:1532_7: Dārako sabbesaṃ ñātīnaṃ santattaṃ cittaṃ nibbāpento jātoti sīvalidārakotvevassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:1532_8: So sattavassāni gabbhe vasitattā jātakālato paṭṭhāya sabbakammakkhamo ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:1532_9: Dhammasenāpati sāriputto sattame divase tena saddhiṃ kathāsallāpaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1536_1: “kiṃ pana tayā evarūpaṃ dukkharāsiṃ anubhavitvā pabbajituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti?
atk-s0508a1:1536_4: Suppavāsā naṃ dārakaṃ therena saddhiṃ kathentaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho me putto dhammasenāpatinā saddhiṃ kathetī”ti theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi –
atk-s0508a1:1536_10: Thero taṃ vihāraṃ netvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā pabbājento “sīvali,
atk-s0508a1:1536_11: na tuyhaṃ aññena ovādena kammaṃ atthi,
atk-s0508a1:1536_16: So pana paṭhamakesavaṭṭiyā ohāraṇakkhaṇeyeva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0508a1:1536_18: tatiyāya anāgāmiphale sabbesaṃyeva pana kesānaṃ oropanañca arahattasacchikiriyā ca apacchā apurimā ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:1536_19: Tassa pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhusaṅghassa cattāro paccayā yāvaticchakaṃ uppajjanti.
atk-s0508a1:1537_5: So pañcasate bhikkhū gahetvā himavantābhimukhaṃ gacchanto aṭavimaggaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0508a1:1537_6: tassa paṭhamaṃ diṭṭhanigrodhe adhivatthā devatā sattadivasāni dānaṃ adāsi. Iti so –
atk-s0508a1:1542_0: Sabbaṭṭhānesu satta satta divasāneva dānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:1542_1: Gandhamādanapabbate pana nāgadattadevarājā nāma sattasu divasesu ekadivase khīrapiṇḍapātaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0508a1:1542_7: “Bhante kassapadasabalassa kāle khīrasalākabhattadānassetaṃ phala”nti devarājā āha.
atk-s0508a1:1542_8: Aparabhāge satthā khadiravaniyarevatassa paccuggamanaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ attano sāsane lābhaggayasaggappattānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a1:1543_0: Evaṃ lābhaggayasaggappattassa pana imassa therassa arahattappattiṃ ekacce ācariyā evaṃ vadanti –
atk-s0508a1:1543_1: “heṭṭhā vuttanayena dhammasenāpatinā ovāde dinne yaṃ mayā kātuṃ sakkā,
atk-s0508a1:1543_2: tamahaṃ jānissāmīti pabbajitvā vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā taṃ divasaṃyeva aññataraṃ vivittaṃ kuṭikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1543_3: disvā taṃ pavisitvā mātukucchismiṃ satta vassāni attanā anubhūtaṃ dukkhaṃ anussaritvā tadanusārena atītānāgate
atk-s0508a1:1543_4: tassa avekkhantassa ādittā viya tayo bhavā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:1543_6: tāvadeva maggappaṭipāṭiyā sabbepi āsave khepento arahattaṃ pāpuṇī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1561_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedanena pītivegena udānento “te me ijjhiṃsu saṅkappā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1562_3: vijjāvimuttiṃ paccesanti ye pubbe mayā kāmasaṅkappādīnaṃ samucchedakarā nekkhammasaṅkappādayo abhipatthitāyeva
atk-s0508a1:1562_6: vimuttādhippāyasaññitā vimuttiṃ uddissa saṅkappā manorathā abhiṇhaso appamattā yadattho yaṃpayojano yesaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1562_7: nipphādanatthaṃ kuṭiṃ suññāgāraṃ vipassituṃ pāvisiṃ tisso vijjā phalavimuttiñca paccesanto,
atk-s0508a1:1562_8: gavesanto te me ijjhiṃsu te sabbeva idāni mayhaṃ ijjhiṃsu samijjhiṃsu,
atk-s0508a1:1562_12: tasmā te me saṅkappā ijjhiṃsūti yojanā.
atk-s0508a1:1562_13: Mānānusaye hi pahīne appahīno nāma anusayo natthi,
atk-s0508a1:1562_14: arahattañca adhigatameva hotīti mānānusayappahānaṃ yathāvuttasaṅkappasamiddhiyā kāraṇaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1567_2: So kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto “asuko ca asuko
atk-s0508a1:1567_3: ca thero satthu paṭhamaṃ dhammapaṭiggāhakā ahesu”nti thomanaṃ sutvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā patthanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1567_5: “ahampi bhagavā anāgate tādisassa sammāsambuddhassa paṭhamaṃ dhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ aññataro bhaveyya”nti,
atk-s0508a1:1567_7: So yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto devamanussesuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1567_8: vāseṭṭhassa nāma brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:1567_10: So asitena isinā “siddhatthakumāro sabbaññū bhavissatī”ti byākato koṇḍaññappamukhehi brāhmaṇaputtehi
atk-s0508a1:1567_11: saddhiṃ gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā “tasmiṃ sabbaññutaṃ patte tassa santike dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1567_12: sutvā amataṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti uruvelāyaṃ viharantaṃ mahāsattaṃ chabbassāni padhānaṃ padahantaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0508a1:1567_14: Abhisambujjhitvā satthārā sattasattāhāni vītināmetvā isipatanaṃ gantvā dhammacakke pavattite pāṭipadadivase
atk-s0508a1:1567_15: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito pañcamiyaṃ pakkhassa aññāsikoṇḍaññādīhi saddhiṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1579_0: Nibbāpetha sakaṃ cittaṃ, mā haññittho punappunaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1589_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attanā paṭiladdhasampattiṃ paccavekkhaṇamukhena satthu guṇamahantataṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0508a1:1589_2: Aho puthujjanabhāvo nāma andhakaraṇo acakkhukaraṇo ariyabhāvoyeva cakkhukaraṇo”ti dassento “passati passo”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1590_1: Tattha passati passoti passati sammādiṭṭhiyā dhamme aviparītaṃ jānāti bujjhatīti passo,
atk-s0508a1:1590_3: so passantaṃ aviparītadassāviṃ “ayaṃ aviparītadassāvī”ti passati paññācakkhunā dhammādhammaṃ yathāsabhāvato jānāti.
atk-s0508a1:1590_6: yo paññācakkhuvirahito dhamme yathāsabhāvato na passati,
atk-s0508a1:1590_7: tampi apassantaṃ puthujjanaṃ “andho vatāyaṃ bhavaṃ acakkhuko”ti attano paññācakkhunā passati.
atk-s0508a1:1590_9: passantañca na passatīti apassanto paññācakkhurahito andhabālo tādisaṃ andhabālaṃ ayaṃ dhammādhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1590_10: yathāsabhāvato na passatīti yathā apassantaṃ na passati na jānāti,
atk-s0508a1:1590_11: evaṃ attano paññācakkhunā dhammādhammaṃ yathāsabhāvato passantañca paṇḍitaṃ “ayaṃ evaṃvidho”ti na passati na jānāti,
atk-s0508a1:1590_12: tasmā ahampi pubbe dassanarahito sakalaṃ ñeyyaṃ hatthāmalakaṃ viya passantaṃ bhagavantaṃ apassantampi pūraṇādiṃ yathāsabhāvato na passiṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1590_13: idāni pana buddhānubhāvena sampanno ubhayepi yathāsabhāvato passāmīti sevitabbāsevitabbesu attano aviparītapaṭipattiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:1593_0: Ekakā mayaṃ araññeti āyasmato vajjiputtattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:1593_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito ekanavute
atk-s0508a1:1593_3: kappe vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a1:1593_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde amaccakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:1593_7: So bhagavato vesāligamane buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā katapubbakicco kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1593_8: gahetvā vesāliyā avidūre aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe viharati.
atk-s0508a1:1593_9: Tena ca samayena vesāliyaṃ ussavo ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:1593_12: taṃ sutvā so bhikkhu ayoniso ummujjanto vivekaṃ vajjamāno kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā attano anabhiratiṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0508a1:1594_0: “Ekakā mayaṃ araññe viharāma, apaviddhaṃva vanasmiṃ dārukaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:1595_0: Etādisikāya rattiyā, ko su nāma amhehi pāpiyo”ti. – gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a1:1596_0: Taṃ sutvā vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā taṃ bhikkhuṃ anukampamānā “yadipi,
atk-s0508a1:1596_3: vivekakāmā pana viddasuno taṃ bahu maññantiyevā”ti imamatthaṃ dassentī –
atk-s0508a1:1597_0: “Ekako tvaṃ araññe viharasi, apaviddhaṃva vanasmiṃ dārukaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:1598_0: Tassa te bahukā pihayanti, nerayikā viya saggagāmina”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:1599_2: niyyānike sammāsambuddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā aniyyānikaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakkessasī”ti santajjentī saṃvejesi.
atk-s0508a1:1599_3: Evaṃ so bhikkhu tāya devatāya saṃvejito kasābhihato viya bhadro assājānīyo vipassanāvīthiṃ otaritvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:1609_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā “ayaṃ me arahattappattiyā aṅkuso jāto”ti attano devatāya ca vuttanayaṃ saṃkaḍḍhitvā –
atk-s0508a1:1611_0: “Ekakā mayaṃ araññe viharāma, apaviddhaṃva vanasmiṃ dārukaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:1612_0: Tassa me bahukā pihayanti, nerayikā viya saggagāmina”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:1614_1: anapekkhabhāvena vane chaḍḍitadārukkhaṇḍaṃ viya yadipi mayaṃ ekakā ekākino asahāyā imasmiṃ araññe viharāma,
atk-s0508a1:1614_2: evaṃ viharato pana tassa me bahukā pihayanti maṃ bahū atthakāmarūpā kulaputtā abhipatthenti,
atk-s0508a1:1614_3: “aho vatassa mayampi vajjiputtatthero viya gharabandhanaṃ pahāya araññe vihareyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1614_6: yathā nāma nerayikā attano pāpakammena niraye nibbattasattā saggagāmīnaṃ saggūpagāmīnaṃ pihayanti –
atk-s0508a1:1614_7: “aho vata mayampi nirayadukkhaṃ pahāya saggasukhaṃ paccanubhaveyyāmā”ti evaṃsampadamidanti attho.
atk-s0508a1:1614_8: Ettha ca attani garubahuvacanappayogassa icchitabbattā “ekakā mayaṃ viharāmā”ti puna tassa atthassa ekattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1614_11: “saggagāmina”nti ca ubhayampi ‘pihayantī’ti padaṃ apekkhitvā upayogatthe sampadānaniddeso daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0508a1:1614_12: Taṃ abhipatthentīti ca tādise araññavāsādiguṇe abhipatthentā nāma hontīti katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1614_13: Tassa meti vā tassa mama santike guṇeti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:1617_2: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto ito ekanavute kappe yakkhasenāpati
atk-s0508a1:1617_3: hutvā vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso dibbavatthena pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1617_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sakkesu devadahanigame sākiyarājakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:1617_6: Athassa daharakāle vātarogena pādā na vahiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:1617_7: So katipayaṃ kālaṃ pīṭhasappī viya vicari.
atk-s0508a1:1617_10: so bhagavato ñātisamāgame pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā katapubbakicco kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharati.
atk-s0508a1:1617_11: Athekadivasaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisituṃ gacchanto antarāmagge aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:1617_12: Tasmiñca samaye aññataro kulalo maṃsapesiṃ ādāya ākāsena gacchati,
atk-s0508a1:1617_17: evaṃ kāmā nāma bahusādhāraṇā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā”ti –
atk-s0508a1:1617_18: kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ paccavekkhitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā “anicca”ntiādinā manasikaronto
atk-s0508a1:1617_19: piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1626_0: “Aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthu sampadā;
atk-s0508a1:1637_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā yadeva saṃvegavatthuṃ aṅkusaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aññā adhigatā,
atk-s0508a1:1637_1: tassa saṃkittanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto “cutā patantī”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1638_11: cutā pana sā bhūmiyaṃ patitā ca,
atk-s0508a1:1638_12: giddhā gedhaṃ āpannā sabbeva kulalā punarāgatā.
atk-s0508a1:1638_14: evaṃ saṃsāre paribbhamantā sattā ye kusaladhammato cutā,
atk-s0508a1:1638_17: sampattibhave ṭhitā tattha kāmasukhānuyogavasena kāmabhave rūpārūpabhavesu ca bhavanikantivasena giddhā
atk-s0508a1:1638_18: ca punarāgatā bhavato aparimuttattā tena tena bhavagāminā kammena taṃ taṃ bhavasaññitaṃ dukkhaṃ āgatā eva,
atk-s0508a1:1638_20: Mayā pana kataṃ kiccaṃ pariññādibhedaṃ soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1638_22: Rataṃ rammaṃ ramitabbaṃ ariyehi sabbasaṅkhatavinissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ rataṃ abhirataṃ rammaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1638_23: Tena ca sukhenanvāgataṃ sukhaṃ phalasamāpattisukhena anuāgataṃ upagataṃ accantasukhaṃ nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1638_24: sukhena vā sukhāpaṭipadābhūtena vipassanāsukhena maggasukhena ca anvāgataṃ phalasukhaṃ nibbānasukhañcāti attho veditabbo.
atk-s0508a1:1641_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito ekanavute
atk-s0508a1:1641_3: kappe vipassissa bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1641_4: mahatiyā parisāya parivutaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ disvā pasannamānaso catūhi suvaṇṇapupphehi pūjesi.
atk-s0508a1:1641_5: Bhagavā tassa pasādasaṃvaḍḍhanatthaṃ tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāresi,
atk-s0508a1:1641_6: yathā suvaṇṇābhā sakalaṃ taṃ padesaṃ ottharati.
atk-s0508a1:1641_7: Taṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya pasannamānaso hutvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā taṃ nimittaṃ gahetvā attano gehaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1641_8: gantvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ avijahanto kenaci rogena kālaṃ katvā tusitesu upapanno aparāparaṃ puññāni
atk-s0508a1:1641_9: katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājānaṃ bimbisāraṃ paṭicca ambapāliyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a1:1641_10: Rājā hi bimbisāro taruṇakāle ambapāliyā rūpasampattiṃ sutvā sañjātābhilāso katipayamanussaparivāro aññātakavesena
atk-s0508a1:1641_11: vesāliṃ gantvā ekarattiṃ tāya saṃvāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0508a1:1641_12: Tadā ayaṃ tassā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0508a1:1641_13: Sā ca gabbhassa patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ tassa ārocesi.
atk-s0508a1:1641_14: Rājāpi attānaṃ jānāpetvā dātabbayuttakaṃ datvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:1641_18: So vayappatto bhagavato vesāligamane buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pabbajitvā katapubbakicco vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1647_0: Buddhābhā ca suvaṇṇābhā, āloko vipulo ahu.
atk-s0508a1:1659_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā aññāpadesena aññaṃ byākaronto “dumavhayāyā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1660_4: Uppannoti tassā kucchiyaṃ uppanno uppajjamāno ca.
atk-s0508a1:1660_5: Jāto paṇḍaraketunāti dhavalavatthadhajattā “paṇḍaraketū”ti paññātena bimbisāraraññā hetubhūtena jāto,
atk-s0508a1:1660_10: Ettha ca “dumavhayāya uppanno”ti iminā attukkaṃsanabhāvaṃ apaneti,
atk-s0508a1:1660_14: Māno hi uṇṇatilakkhaṇattā ketu viyāti ketu.
atk-s0508a1:1660_17: Paññā hi anavajjadhammesu accuggataṭṭhena mārasenappamaddanena pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena ca ariyānaṃ dhajā nāma.
atk-s0508a1:1660_21: itare ca kilesadhammā samussitaṭṭhena ketu etassāti mahāketu māro pāpimā.
atk-s0508a1:1660_23: “Mahāketuṃ padhaṃsayī”ti attānaṃ paraṃ viya dassento aññāpadesena arahattaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1663_2: Sopi kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito catunavute
atk-s0508a1:1663_3: kappe siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthāraṃ uddissa māḷaṃ karontassa
atk-s0508a1:1663_4: pūgassa ekatthambhaṃ alabhantassa thambhaṃ datvā sahāyakiccaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1663_5: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:1663_6: sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:1663_8: So satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kosalaraṭṭhe gāmakāvāse vasanto āgatāgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti.
atk-s0508a1:1663_9: “Ayaṃ vinayo idaṃ suttantaṃ ayaṃ abhidhammo”ti pana paricchedaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0508a1:1663_10: Athekadivasaṃ āyasmantaṃ dhammasenāpatiṃ pucchitvā yathāparicchedaṃ sabbaṃ sallakkhesi.
atk-s0508a1:1663_11: Dhammasaṅgītiyā pubbepi piṭakādisamaññā pariyattisaddhamme vavatthitā eva,
atk-s0508a1:1663_13: So tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhanto paripucchanto tattha vutte rūpārūpadhamme sallakkhetvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1665_0: Saraṇaṃ gatā ca te buddhaṃ, saddahanti tathāgataṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1671_0: Māḷaṃ mayaṃ kattukāmā, ekatthambho na labbhati.
atk-s0508a1:1691_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā katakiccattā akilāsubhāve ṭhito attano santikaṃ upagatānaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1691_1: anukampaṃ upādāya tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ vīmaṃsitvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0508a1:1691_2: Desento ca ekadivasaṃ attānaṃ paraṃ viya katvā dassento –
atk-s0508a1:1694_0: Taṃ bhāsati gahaṭṭhānaṃ, sunisinno uḷārapāmojjo”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:1695_1: bhikkhuno santike visuṃ visuṃ uggahitaṃ vinayapadesaṃ suttapadesaṃ abhidhammapadesañca yathāparicchedaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1695_2: vinayasuttābhidhammānaṃyeva upari khipitvā sajjhāyanavasena tattha tattheva pakkhipitvā ṭhitavacchenāti
atk-s0508a1:1695_4: Saṅkalitaṃ bahūhi vassehīti bahukehi saṃvaccharehi sampiṇḍanavasena hadaye ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1695_6: saṅkhalitaṃ viya kataṃ ekābaddhavasena vācuggataṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1695_10: Sunisinnoti tasmiṃ dhamme sammā niccalo nisinno,
atk-s0508a1:1695_11: lābhasakkārādiṃ apaccāsīsanto kevalaṃ vimuttāyatanasīseyeva ṭhatvā kathetīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:1696_1: yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ vitthārena paresaṃ deseti tathā tathā so tasmiṃ dhamme labhati atthavedaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1699_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave kusalabījāni ropento ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa
atk-s0508a1:1699_3: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1699_4: Tasmiñca samaye vipassī bhagavā buddhakiccassa pariyosānamāgamma āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajji.
atk-s0508a1:1699_5: Tena pathavīkampādīsu uppannesu mahājano bhītatasito ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:1699_6: Atha naṃ vessavaṇo mahārājā tamatthaṃ vibhāvetvā samassāsesi.
atk-s0508a1:1699_8: Tatthāyaṃ kulaputto buddhānubhāvaṃ sutvā satthari sañjātagāravabahumāno uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedesi.
atk-s0508a1:1699_9: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ sākiyarājakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:1699_11: So vayappatto satthu santike pabbajitvā bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahanto bhagavati jālikāyaṃ viharante kimikālāya
atk-s0508a1:1699_12: nadiyā tīre ramaṇīyaṃ ambavanaṃ disvā tattha viharitukāmo dve vāre bhagavatā vāretvā tatiyavāraṃ vissajjito
atk-s0508a1:1699_13: tattha gantvā micchāvitakkamakkhikāhi khajjamāno cittasamādhiṃ alabhitvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0508a1:1699_15: cetovimuttiyā pañca dhammā paripākāya saṃvattantī”tiādinā ovādaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1699_16: So tasmiṃ ovāde ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1705_0: Uppādo nu kimatthāya, āloko vipulo ahu.
atk-s0508a1:1707_0: Pāṇabhūte bhayaṃ natthi, ekaggā hotha saṃvutā.
atk-s0508a1:1708_0: “Aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthu sampadā;
atk-s0508a1:1717_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthu sammukhā ovādaṃ labhitvā “mayā arahattaṃ adhigata”nti aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:1720_0: Tassāhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvāna, vihāsiṃ santike sato;
atk-s0508a1:1721_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:1722_1: cetovimuttiyā pañca dhammā paripākāya saṃvattantī”tiādinā ovadi anusiṭṭhiṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1722_4: Sabbadhammāna pāragūti sabbesañca ñeyyadhammānaṃ pāraṃ pariyantaṃ ñāṇagamanena gato adhigatoti sabbadhammāna pāragū,
atk-s0508a1:1722_6: Sabbesaṃ vā saṅkhatadhammānaṃ pārabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ sayambhūñāṇena gato adhigatoti sabbadhammāna pāragū.
atk-s0508a1:1722_7: Tassāhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvānāti tassa buddhassa bhagavato sāmukkaṃsikaṃ taṃ catusaccadhammaṃ suṇitvā.
atk-s0508a1:1722_8: Vihāsiṃ santiketi ambavane micchāvitakkehi upadduto cālikā vihāraṃ gantvā satthu samīpeyeva vihāsiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1722_11: Ahanti idaṃ yathā “anusāsī”ti ettha “ma”nti evaṃ “vijjā anuppattā,
atk-s0508a1:1722_13: “Kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti ca iminā yathāvuttaṃ vijjāttayānuppattimeva satthu ovādapaṭikaraṇabhāvadassanena pariyāyantarena pakāseti.
atk-s0508a1:1725_0: Kilesā jhāpitā mayhanti āyasmato ekadhammasavanīyattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:1725_2: So kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatto katipaye bhikkhū maggamūḷhe mahāraññe
atk-s0508a1:1725_3: vicarante disvā anukampamāno attano bhavanato otaritvā te samassāsetvā bhojetvā yathādhippetaṭṭhānaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0508a1:1725_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassape bhagavati loke uppajjitvā katabuddhakicce parinibbute tasmiṃ kāle bārāṇasirājā kikī nāma ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:1725_5: Tasmiṃ kālaṅkate tassa puthuvindarājā nāma putto āsi.
atk-s0508a1:1725_7: Tassa putto kikībrahmadatto nāma hutvā rajjaṃ kārento sāsane antarahite dhammassavanaṃ alabhanto,
atk-s0508a1:1725_9: tassa sahassaṃ dammī”ti ghosāpetvā ekampi dhammakathikaṃ alabhanto,
atk-s0508a1:1725_14: tāvadeva pabbajissāmī”ti rajjaṃ pahāya himavantaṃ uddissa gacchantaṃ sakko devarājā āgantvā,
atk-s0508a1:1725_15: “aniccā vata saṅkhārā”ti gāthāya dhammaṃ kathetvā nivattesi.
atk-s0508a1:1725_16: So nivattitvā bahuṃ puññaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde setabyanagare seṭṭhikule
atk-s0508a1:1725_17: nibbattitvā vayappatto bhagavati setabyanagare siṃsapāvane viharante satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā
atk-s0508a1:1725_20: “aniccā vata saṅkhārā”ti imāya gāthāya dhammaṃ desesi.
