atk-s0508a1:4979_3: kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso tālavaṇṭaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4979_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4979_5: sāṭimattiyoti laddhanāmo vayappatto hetusampannatāya āraññakabhikkhūnaṃ santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a1:4985_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā bhikkhū ovadati anusāsati bahū ca satte dhammaṃ kathetvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0508a1:4985_1: Aññatarañca kulaṃ assaddhaṃ appasannaṃ saddhaṃ pasannaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4985_2: Tena tasmiṃ kule manussā there abhippasannā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4985_3: Tatthekā dārikā abhirūpā dassanīyā theraṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ sakkaccaṃ bhojanena parivisati.
atk-s0508a1:4985_5: appatiṭṭho bhavissatī”ti cintetvā therassa rūpena gantvā taṃ dārikaṃ hatthe aggahesi.
atk-s0508a1:4985_8: Taṃ disvā gharajano there appasādaṃ janesi.
atk-s0508a1:4985_9: Punadivase thero taṃ kāraṇaṃ anāvajjento taṃ gharaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4985_11: Thero taṃ kāraṇaṃ āvajjento mārassa kiriyaṃ disvā “tassa gīvāyaṃ kukkurakuṇapaṃ paṭimuñcatū”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0508a1:4985_12: tassa mocanatthaṃ upagatena mārena atītadivase katakiriyaṃ kathāpetvā taṃ tajjetvā vissajjesi.
atk-s0508a1:4987_0: “Ahu tuyhaṃ pure saddhā, sā te ajja na vijjati;
atk-s0508a1:4988_0: Yaṃ tuyhaṃ tuyhamevetaṃ, natthi duccaritaṃ mama.
atk-s0508a1:4990_0: “Aniccā hi calā saddhā, evaṃ diṭṭhā hi sā mayā;
atk-s0508a1:4991_0: Rajjantipi virajjanti, tattha kiṃ jiyyate muni.
atk-s0508a1:4993_0: “Paccati munino bhattaṃ, thokaṃ thokaṃ kule kule;
atk-s0508a1:4996_1: sā te ajja na vijjatīti, upāsaka,
atk-s0508a1:4996_2: ito pubbe tava mayi “ayyo dhammacārī samacārī”tiādinā saddhā ahosi,
atk-s0508a1:4996_3: sā saddhā te tava ajja idāni na upalabbhati.
atk-s0508a1:4996_7: sammā pasannacittena hi dānaṃ nāma dātabbanti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:4996_8: Atha vā yaṃ tuyhaṃ tuyhamevetanti yaṃ tava mayi ajja agāravaṃ pavattaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4996_12: Natthi duccaritaṃ mamāti mama pana duccaritaṃ nāma natthi maggeneva duccaritahetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā.
atk-s0508a1:4997_0: Aniccā hi calā saddhāti yasmā pothujjanikā saddhā aniccā ekantikā na hoti,
atk-s0508a1:4997_1: tato eva calā assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍaṃ viya,
atk-s0508a1:4997_3: Evaṃ diṭṭhā hi sā mayāti evaṃ bhūtā ca sā saddhā mayā tayi diṭṭhā paccakkhato viditā.
atk-s0508a1:4997_4: Rajjantipi virajjantīti evaṃ tassā anavaṭṭhitattā eva ime sattā kadāci katthaci mittasanthavavasena rajjanti sinehampi karonti,
atk-s0508a1:4997_6: Tattha kiṃ jiyyate munīti tasmiṃ puthujjanānaṃ rajjane virajjane ca muni pabbajito kiṃ jiyyati,
atk-s0508a1:4998_1: kathaṃ tumhe yāpethā”ti evaṃ mā cintayīti dassento “paccatī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:4998_2: Tassattho munino pabbajitassa bhattaṃ nāma kule kule anugharaṃ divase divase thokaṃ thokaṃ paccate,
atk-s0508a1:4998_5: atthi jaṅghabalaṃ mamāti atthi me jaṅghabalaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4998_6: nāhaṃ obhaggajaṅgho na khañjo na ca pādarogī,
atk-s0508a1:4998_8: “yathāpi bhamaro puppha”ntiādinā satthārā vuttanayena piṇḍāya caritvā yāpessāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:5001_2: Ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulaghare nibbatto ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0508a1:5001_3: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ vinayadharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0508a1:5001_4: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kappakagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0508a1:5001_6: So vayappatto anuruddhādīnaṃ channaṃ khattiyānaṃ pasādako hutvā tathāgate anupiyambavane viharante pabbajanatthāya
atk-s0508a1:5001_7: nikkhamantehi chahi khattiyehi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0508a1:5002_0: So pabbajitvā upasampanno satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā “mayhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0508a1:5002_2: Bhikkhu tava araññe vasantassa ekameva dhuraṃ vaḍḍhissati,
atk-s0508a1:5002_3: amhākaṃ pana santike vasantassa ganthadhurañca vipassanādhurañca paripūressatīti.
atk-s0508a1:5002_4: Thero satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:5006_0: Lakkhaṇe itihāse ca, sadhamme pāramiṃ gato.
atk-s0508a1:5008_0: Carakā tāpasā ceva, caranti mahiyā tadā.
atk-s0508a1:5010_0: Bahujjano maṃ pūjeti, nāhaṃ pūjemi kiñcanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5012_0: Buddhoti vacanaṃ natthi, tāva nuppajjate jino.
atk-s0508a1:5014_0: Sabbaṃ tamaṃ vinodetvā, loke uppajji cakkhumā.
atk-s0508a1:5017_0: “Pitu atthāya so buddho, dhammaṃ desesi cakkhumā;
atk-s0508a1:5018_0: Tena kālena parisā, samantā yojanaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:5024_0: Aṭṭhame divase patte, sunandaṃ kittayī jino.
atk-s0508a1:5028_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:5032_0: Hāsayanto janaṃ sabbaṃ, dassayanto sakaṃ balaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5035_0: “Tattha me ahu saṅkappo, sutvāna munino vacaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:5036_0: Ahampi kāraṃ kassāmi, yathā passāmi gotamaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5040_0: Vinaye agganikkhitto, taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthaye ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5042_0: Tena bhogena buddhassa, ārāmaṃ māpaye ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5052_0: Mā naṃ koci viheṭhesi, santacittāna tādinaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5066_0: Sobhano nāma ārāmo, sampaṭiccha tuvaṃ muni.
atk-s0508a1:5073_0: “Hatthī assā rathā pattī, senā ca caturaṅginī;
atk-s0508a1:5088_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:5090_0: Upāli nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a1:5101_0: “Bhave sātaṃ na vindāmi, ḍayhanto tīhi aggibhi;
atk-s0508a1:5106_0: Taṃ pivitvā sukhī assa, visamhā parimuttiyā.
atk-s0508a1:5116_0: Tassa so vihane bhūtaṃ, samūlañca vināsaye.
atk-s0508a1:5120_0: So me tamaṃ vinodesi, bhūtavejjova bhūtakaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5134_0: Devānaṃ sā piyā evaṃ, āsāvatī latuttamā.
atk-s0508a1:5136_0: Sāyaṃ pātaṃ namassāmi, devā āsāvatiṃ yathā.
atk-s0508a1:5138_0: Dūrāgatampi maṃ santaṃ, khaṇoyaṃ na virādhayi.
atk-s0508a1:5144_0: Meghesu gajjamānesu, gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti tā sadā.
atk-s0508a1:5145_0: “Cirampi gabbhaṃ dhārenti, yāva megho na gajjati;
atk-s0508a1:5154_0: Caturo ca phale sabbe, dhammevaṃ vijanayiṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5158_0: Na me samasamo atthi, dhāremi sāsanaṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5160_0: Ettha me vimati natthi, akkhare byañjanepi vā.
atk-s0508a1:5166_0: Anaññātaṃ mayā natthi, ekaggo satthu sāsane.
atk-s0508a1:5174_0: Aṭṭālake ca vividhe, kāraye nagare bahū.
atk-s0508a1:5180_0: Mā me bhaṇḍaṃ vinassīti, bhaṇḍarakkhaṃ ṭhapeti so.
atk-s0508a1:5181_0: “Mamatto hoti yo rañño, vuddhiṃ yassa ca icchati;
atk-s0508a1:5192_0: Saddhā te esikā vīra, dvārapālo ca saṃvaro.
atk-s0508a1:5198_0: Āneñjañca nirodho ca, esā dhammakuṭī tava.
atk-s0508a1:5202_0: Kolito nāma nāmena, porohicco tavaṃ mune.
atk-s0508a1:5206_0: Ānando nāma nāmena, dhammārakkho tavaṃ mune.
atk-s0508a1:5210_0: Tattha me cintanā natthi, taññevatthaṃ kathemahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5212_0: Vinaye mādiso natthi, kuto bhiyyo bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:5214_0: Upālissa samo natthi, vinaye khandhakesu ca.
atk-s0508a1:5220_0: So me attho anuppatto, vinaye pāramiṃ gato.
atk-s0508a1:5222_0: Vijahitvāna taṃ jātiṃ, putto jāto mahesino.
atk-s0508a1:5225_0: “Tassa rañño ahaṃ putto, candano nāma khattiyo;
atk-s0508a1:5230_0: Āruyha sirikaṃ nāgaṃ, nagarā nikkhamiṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:5232_0: Devalo nāma sambuddho, āgacchi purato mama.
atk-s0508a1:5234_0: Tato sañjātakopo so, nāgo nuddharate padaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5237_0: “Sātaṃ tattha na vindāmi, siro pajjalito yathā;
atk-s0508a1:5244_0: Purā sabbe vinassāma, khamāpessāma taṃ muniṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5256_0: Pariḷāhaṃ vinodehi, mā no raṭṭhaṃ vināsaya.
atk-s0508a1:5258_0: Ayomayena kūṭena, siraṃ bhindeyyu me sadā.
atk-s0508a1:5259_0: “Dake aggi na saṇṭhāti, bījaṃ sele na rūhati;
atk-s0508a1:5260_0: Agade kimi na saṇṭhāti, kopo buddhe na jāyati.
atk-s0508a1:5261_0: “Yathā ca bhūmi acalā, appameyyo ca sāgaro;
atk-s0508a1:5262_0: Anantako ca ākāso, evaṃ buddhā akhobhiyā.
atk-s0508a1:5264_0: Khantānaṃ khamitānañca, gamanaṃ taṃ na vijjati.
atk-s0508a1:5268_0: Samatikkamma taṃ jātiṃ, pāvisiṃ abhayaṃ puraṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5274_0: Atthaṃ tuyhaṃ pavakkhāmi, yathā diṭṭhaṃ padaṃ mama.
atk-s0508a1:5277_0: “Mā vo khaṇaṃ virādhetha, khaṇātītā hi socare;
atk-s0508a1:5284_0: Āsīviso diṭṭhaviso, evaṃ jhāpeti taṃ naraṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5288_0: Sadevakaṃ so tāreti, tasmā te avirādhiyā.
atk-s0508a1:5290_0: Pathavīsadisā buddhā, tasmā te na virādhiyā.
atk-s0508a1:5292_0: Rāhule dhanapāle ca, sabbesaṃ samako muni.
atk-s0508a1:5302_0: Kappemi vinaye vāsaṃ, vinayo mama gocaro.
atk-s0508a1:5304_0: Upāli taṃ mahāvīra, pāde vandati satthuno.
atk-s0508a1:5305_0: “So ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
atk-s0508a1:5308_0: Tattha hi naṃ satthā sayameva sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ uggaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0508a1:5308_1: So aparabhāge bhārukacchakavatthuṃ ajjukavatthuṃ kumārakassapavatthunti imāni tīṇi vatthūni vinicchayi.
atk-s0508a1:5308_2: Satthā ekekasmiṃ vinicchite sādhukāraṃ datvā tayopi vinicchaye aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ vinayadharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a1:5308_3: So aparabhāge ekasmiṃ uposathadivase pātimokkhuddesasamaye bhikkhū ovadanto –
atk-s0508a1:5314_0: Saṅghasmiṃ viharaṃ bhikkhu, sikkhetha vinayaṃ budho.
atk-s0508a1:5317_0: Kappākappesu kusalo, careyya apurakkhato”ti. – tisso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:5318_7: Mitte bhajeyya kalyāṇe suddhājīve atanditeti “piyo garu bhāvanīyo”tiādinā vuttalakkhaṇe kalyāṇamitte,
atk-s0508a1:5318_11: Saṅghasmiṃ viharanti saṅghe bhikkhusamūhe vattapaṭivattapūraṇavasena viharanto.
atk-s0508a1:5318_12: Sikkhetha vinayaṃ budhoti bodhañāṇatāsukusalo hutvā vinayapariyattiṃ sikkheyya.
atk-s0508a1:5318_17: Kappākappesūti kappiyākappiyesu kusalo suttavasena suttānulomavasena ca nipuṇo cheko.
atk-s0508a1:5318_18: Apurakkhatoti na purakkhato taṇhādīhi kutoci purekkhāraṃ apaccāsīsanto hutvā vihareyya.
atk-s0508a1:5321_0: Paṇḍitaṃ vata maṃ santanti āyasmato uttarapālattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:5321_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato gamanamagge setuṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0508a1:5321_3: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:5321_4: uttarapāloti laddhanāmo vayappatto yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0508a1:5321_5: Tassa ekadivasaṃ ayonisomanasikāravasena anubhūtārammaṇaṃ anussarantassa kāmarāgo uppajji.
atk-s0508a1:5321_6: So tāvadeva sahoḍḍhaṃ coraṃ gaṇhanto viya attano cittaṃ niggahetvā saṃvegajāto paṭipakkhamanasikārena
atk-s0508a1:5321_7: kilese vikkhambhetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:5327_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā sīhanādaṃ nadanto –
atk-s0508a1:5330_0: Pañca kāmaguṇā loke, sammohā pātayiṃsu maṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5335_0: “Sabbe kāmā pahīnā me, bhavā sabbe padālitā;
atk-s0508a1:5338_0: Tattha paṇḍitaṃ vata maṃ santanti sutacintāmayāya paññāya vasena paññāsampannampi nāma maṃ samānaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5338_1: Alamatthavicintakanti attano ca paresañca atthaṃ hitaṃ vicintetuṃ samatthaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:5338_10: lokato vā uttaritukāmaṃ maṃ loke pātayiṃsūti attho.
atk-s0508a1:5339_3: Devaputtamārassa vā issariyaṭṭhāne taṃ anupavisitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0508a1:5339_8: ahaṃ pāsā pamuccitunti aggamaggasaṇḍāsena rāgādisallaṃ anavasesato uddharantoyeva rāgabandhanasaṅkhātā maccurājassa pāsā ahaṃ parimuccituṃ asakkhiṃ,
atk-s0508a1:5340_0: Tato eva ca sabbe kāmā pahīnā me,
atk-s0508a1:5340_1: bhavā sabbe padālitāti vatthārammaṇādibhedena anekabhedabhinnā sabbe kilesakāmā ariyamaggena samucchedavasena mayā pahīnā.
atk-s0508a1:5340_2: Kilesakāmesu hi pahīnesu vatthukāmāpi pahīnā eva honti.
atk-s0508a1:5340_3: Tathā kāmabhavakammabhavādayo bhavā sabbe maggañāṇāsinā padālitā viddhaṃsitā.
atk-s0508a1:5340_4: Kammabhavesu hi padālitesu upapattibhavā padālitā eva honti.
atk-s0508a1:5340_5: Evaṃ kammabhavānaṃ padālitattā eva vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro,
atk-s0508a1:5343_0: Suṇātha ñātayo sabbeti āyasmato abhibhūtattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:5343_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vessabhussa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:5343_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto tādisena kalyāṇamittasannissayena sāsane abhippasanno ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:5343_4: So satthari parinibbute tassa dhātuṃ gahetuṃ mahājane ussāhaṃ karonte sayaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ gandhodakena citakaṃ nibbāpesi.
atk-s0508a1:5343_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde veṭhapuranagare rājakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:5343_6: abhibhūtoti laddhanāmo pitu accayena rajjaṃ kāreti.
atk-s0508a1:5343_7: Tasmiñca samaye bhagavā janapadacārikaṃ caranto anupubbena taṃ nagaraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:5343_8: Tato so rājā “bhagavā kira mama nagaraṃ anuppatto”ti sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā dutiyadivase mahādānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0508a1:5343_9: Bhagavā bhuttāvī tassa rañño ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ anumodanaṃ karontoyeva vitthārato dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0508a1:5343_10: So dhammaṃ sutvā laddhappasādo rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:5349_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhena viharante tasmiṃ tassa ñātakā amaccā pārisajjā nāgarā jānapadāti sabbe samāgantvā, “bhante,
atk-s0508a1:5349_1: kasmā tvaṃ amhe anāthe katvā pabbajito”ti parideviṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:5349_2: Thero te ñātipamukhe manusse paridevante disvā tesaṃ attano pabbajjakāraṇavibhāvanamukhena dhammaṃ kathento –
atk-s0508a1:5352_0: Dhammaṃ vo desayissāmi, dukkhā jāti punappunaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5358_0: Pahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ, dukkhassantaṃ karissatī”ti. – tisso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:5359_1: idāni mayā vuccamānaṃ ohitasotā sotadvārānusārena upadhārethāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:5359_2: Ñātayoti ñātī pamukhe katvā tesaṃ sabbesaṃ ālapanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:5359_5: etissaṃ vā mama pabbajjāya samāgatāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:5360_1: taṃ “dhammaṃ vo desayissāmī”ti paṭijānitvā “dukkhā jāti punappuna”ntiādinā desetuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0508a1:5360_2: Tattha dukkhā jāti punappunanti jāti nāmesā gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedassa jarādibhedassa ca anekavihitassa dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato dukkhā.
atk-s0508a1:5361_0: Tassā pana jātiyā samatikkamanatthaṃ ussāho karaṇīyoti dassento āha “ārambhathā”tiādi.
atk-s0508a1:5361_2: Nikkamathāti kosajjapakkhato nikkhantattā nikkamadhātusaṅkhātaṃ taduttariṃ vīriyaṃ karotha.
atk-s0508a1:5361_3: Yuñjatha buddhasāsaneti yasmā sīlasaṃvaro indriyesu guttadvāratā bhojane mattaññutā satisampajaññanti
atk-s0508a1:5361_4: imesu dhammesu patiṭṭhitānaṃ jāgariyānuyogavasena ārambhanikkamadhātuyo sampajjanti,
atk-s0508a1:5361_5: tasmā tathābhūtā samathavipassanāsaṅkhāte adhisīlasikkhādisaṅkhāte vā bhagavato sāsane yuttappayuttā hotha.
atk-s0508a1:5361_7: naḷāgāraṃva kuñjaroti evaṃ paṭipajjantā ca tedhātuissarassa maccurājassa vasaṃ satte netīti tassa senāsaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5361_8: abalaṃ dubbalaṃ yathā nāma thāmabalūpapanno kuñjaro naḷehi kataṃ agāraṃ khaṇeneva viddhaṃseti,
atk-s0508a1:5361_9: evameva kilesagaṇaṃ dhunātha vidhamatha viddhaṃsethāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:5362_0: Evaṃ pana buddhasāsane ussāhaṃ karontassa ekaṃsiko jātidukkhassa samatikkamoti dassento “yo imasmi”ntiādinā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:5365_2: Ayaṃ kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto sikhimhi bhagavati parinibbute
atk-s0508a1:5365_3: tassa citakaṃ devamanussesu pūjentesu aṭṭhahi campakapupphehi citakaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0508a1:5365_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sakyarājakule nibbattitvā gotamoti
atk-s0508a1:5365_5: gottavaseneva abhilakkhitanāmo vayappatto satthu ñātisamāgame paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a1:5371_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā vimuttisukhena viharanto ekadivasaṃ ñātakehi “kasmā, bhante,
atk-s0508a1:5371_1: amhe pahāya pabbajito”ti puṭṭho saṃsāre attanā anubhūtadukkhañceva idāni adhigataṃ nibbānasukhañca pakāsento –
atk-s0508a1:5374_0: Dukkhamamhipi tiracchānayoniyaṃ, nekadhā hi vusitaṃ ciraṃ mayā.
atk-s0508a1:5380_0: Taṃ viditvā mahamahattasambhavaṃ, santimeva satimā samajjhaga”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:5382_0: Tattha saṃsaranti anādimati saṃsāre saṃsaranto kammakilesehi pañcasu gatīsu cavanupapātavasena aparāparaṃ saṃsarantoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:5382_12: Nekadhā hīti oṭṭhagoṇagadrabhādivasena ceva kākabalākakulalādivasena ca anekappakāraṃ anekavārañca ciraṃ
atk-s0508a1:5382_13: dīghamaddhānaṃ mayā vusitaṃ niccaṃ utrastamānasatādivasena dukkhaṃ anubhūtaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5382_14: Tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattasatto mahāmūḷhatāya cirataraṃ tattheva aparāparaṃ parivattatīti dassanatthaṃ idha “cira”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5383_0: Mānusopi ca bhavobhirādhitoti manussattabhāvopi mayā tādisena kusalakammunā samavāyena abhirādhito sādhito adhigato.
atk-s0508a1:5383_2: Saggakāyamagamaṃ sakiṃ sakinti saggagatisaṅkhātaṃ kāmāvacaradevakāyaṃ sakiṃ sakiṃ kadāci kadāci upapajjanavasena agacchiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5383_4: Nevasaññisu asaññisuṭṭhitanti rūpārūpadhātūsu ca na kevalaṃ saññīsu eva,
atk-s0508a1:5383_5: atha kho nevasaññīnāsaññīsu asaññīsu ca upapajja ṭhitaṃ mayāti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5383_8: ye pana ito bāhirakā tattha niccasaññino bhavavimokkhasaññino ca,
atk-s0508a1:5383_9: tesaṃ tassā saññāya micchābhāvadassanatthaṃ visuṃ gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5384_0: Evaṃ dvīhi gāthāhi bhavamūlassa anupacchinnattā anādimati saṃsāre attano vaṭṭadukkhānubhavaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0508a1:5384_1: idāni tadupacchedena vivaṭṭasukhānubhavaṃ dassento “sambhavā”tiādinā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:5384_3: Kāmabhavādayo eva hi hetupaccayasamavāyena bhavantīti idha sambhavāti vuttā.
atk-s0508a1:5384_8: Pacalitāti saṅkhatattā eva uppādajarādīhi pakārato calitā anavaṭṭhitā.
atk-s0508a1:5384_11: Taṃ viditvā mahamattasambhavanti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ saṅkhatasabhāvaṃ attasambhavaṃ attani sambhūtaṃ attāyattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5384_12: issarādivasena aparāyattaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena ahaṃ viditvā tappaṭipakkhabhūtaṃ santimeva nibbānameva
atk-s0508a1:5384_13: maggapaññāsatiyā satimā hutvā samajjhagaṃ adhigacchiṃ ariyamaggabhāvanāya anuppattoti.
atk-s0508a1:5384_14: Evaṃ thero ñātakānaṃ dhammadesanāmukhena aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:5387_0: Yo pubbe karaṇīyānīti āyasmato hāritattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a1:5387_2: Ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute tassa citakapūjāya kayiramānāya gandhena pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:5387_3: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:5387_4: hāritoti laddhanāmo vayappatto jātimānaṃ nissāya aññe vasalavādena samudācarati.
atk-s0508a1:5387_5: So bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitopi ciraparicitattā vasalasamudācāraṃ na vissajji.
atk-s0508a1:5387_6: Athekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā sañjātasaṃvego vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā attano cittappavattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:5387_7: upaparikkhanto mānuddhaccaviggahitataṃ disvā taṃ pahāya vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:5393_0: Arahā pana hutvā vimuttisukhaṃ anubhavanto “yo pubbe karaṇīyānī”tiādinā tīhi gāthāhi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādadānamukhena aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:5396_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:5396_3: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute sādhukīḷanadivasesu vītivattesu
atk-s0508a1:5396_4: satthu sarīraṃ gahetvā upāsakesu jhāpanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantesu satthu guṇe āvajjitvā pasannamānaso sumanapupphehi
atk-s0508a1:5396_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bārāṇasiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:5396_7: vimaloti laddhanāmo vayappatto somamittattheraṃ nissāya sāsane pabbajitvā teneva ussāhito vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5402_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano sahāyassa bhikkhussa ovādaṃ dento –
atk-s0508a1:5405_0: Ovāde cassa tiṭṭheyya, patthento acalaṃ sukhaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5414_2: Bhajeyyuttamapuggalanti sappurisaṃ paṇḍitaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ ovādānusāsanīgahaṇavasena seveyya.
atk-s0508a1:5414_3: Ovāde cassa tiṭṭheyyāti assa kalyāṇamittassa ovāde anusiṭṭhiyaṃ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjanavasena tiṭṭheyya.
